ALTHOUGH TIMES THOUGHT COMES FRUITION , DIFFICULT BELIEVE PLACE STUDENTS HANDLE BUSINESS SIMPLY UNAPPEALING , DUE UNHYGIENIC MESSY AURA BATHROOMS . BATHROOMS ONGOING ISSUE MILLENIA . ALTHOUGH MANY SCHOOLS BELIEVE BATHROOMS SATISFACTORY CONTEXT SANITATION , MAJORITY STUDENTS DISAGREE BELIEVE RESTROOMS UNHEALTHY UNSANITARY , ALSO DISORDERLY . BELIEVE NEEDS CHANGE . ’ TIME IMPROVE AREA BUSINESS , 'S TIME IMPROVE BATHROOMS . ALTHOUGH SEEMINGLY COUNTLESS PROBLEMS PUBLIC BATHROOMS GENERAL , ONE BIGGEST ISSUES SURROUNDING BOYS RESTROOMS ; ELSIK HIGH SCHOOL LACK PRIVACY . CURRENTLY MAIN CAMPUS , TOTAL 26 BOYS RESTROOMS THROUGHOUT BUILDING , HOWEVER 26 BATHROOMS , 13 STALLS SEPARATING TOILETS URINALS . “ MAKES UNCOMFORTABLE ” SAYS JERRY RIVERA , STUDENT ATTENDING ELSIK . PRIVACY IMPORTANT , N'T MATTER . NEED PRIVACY LIVES . IMPORTANTLY , SPECIFICALLY NEED PRIVACY WITHIN BATHROOMS SCHOOLS . N'T PRIVACY BATHROOMS , STUDENTS EXPOSED MANY RISKS . BATHROOMS WENT DOCTOR YEARLY CHECK , WOULD TOLD NUMEROUS WRONGS , LIKE “ ’ MESSY ” “ SHOWERING DAILY ? ” UNFORTUNATELY US STUDENTS , MUST BEAR SMELL BUSINESS WITHIN BATHROOM WALLS , WHILST ALSO DEALING SANITARY ISSUES . SANITATION KEY COMPONENT LIVES CHILDREN , AFFECTS FEEL , ALSO LEARN . WORDS LAUREN NEWMAN , JOURNALIST EAGLEEYE NEWS , SANITARY HAZARDS INCLUDE LACK VENTILATION , TOILET PAPER , SOAP SOMETIMES EVEN URINE TOILET WATER FLOOR . FURTHERMORE , STUDY CONDUCTED MS. NEWMAN FOUND 67 % STUDENTS PURPOSELY AVOID USING SCHOOL BATHROOMS WOULD RATHER WAIT TILL GOT HOME . SIMPLY MEANS BATHROOMS FAR UNSANITARY STUDENTS USE . OKAY , KNOW BATHROOMS UNHEALTHY , QUESTION ? BATHROOMS VARY TOILET TOILET , SCHOOL 'S QUITE COMMON FIND TOILET PAPER PAPER TOWELS BATHROOM FLOOR . FURTHERMORE , ARGUABLY UNHYGIENIC FACTOR BATHROOMS TOILETS . TOILETS ALMOST ALWAYS COVERED URINE , INCENTIVISING STUDENTS HOLD . , “ 0 ” SHAPE TOILETS INCREASE RISK BACKSPLASH SITTING , INCREASES CHANCES PRIVATES RESTING SOMEONE ELSES PRIVATES . LETS FACE ; BATHROOMS PRETTY DISGUSTING , HOWEVER SOLUTION “ MESSY ” SITUATION . WHETHER ’ PAPER TOWELS FLOOR URINE TOILET SEATS , SOLUTION VIRTUALLY PROBLEMS . ARTICLE PUBLISHED SIMON LOCKREY , PROFESSOR RMIT UNIVERSITY , LOCKREY DESCRIBES HAND DRYERS MUCH SANITARY , ALSO BETTER ENVIRONMENT . FACT , HAND DRYERS PROVEN 126 % SANITARY CONTRARY PAPER TOWELS , MAKING AIR DRYING FAR BENEFICIAL ALTERNATIVE . ONE OBVIOUS ADVANTAGES AIR DRYING AID ENVIRONMENT . USE HAND DRYERS , ELIMINATES NEED PAPER TOWELS , MAKING PAPER TOWELS THING PAST . HOWEVER LET ’ FORGET UNHYGIENIC AURA TOILETS . QUESTION ’ PROBABLY ASKING RIGHT “ TOILETS ACCOUNTED ? ” ALTHOUGH SEEMS COMPLICATED , ANSWER LOT CLEAR SEEMS . ’ RECOGNIZED “ 0 ” SHAPE TOILET LIDS CAUSE NUMEROUS PROBLEMS , SANITARY ALTERNATIVE WOULD “ U ” SHAPE . “ U ” SHAPE ELIMINATES PROBLEMS PREVIOUSLY ENCOUNTERED BACKSPLASH PUTTING PRIVATES SOMEONE ELSE ’ . END DAY , BATHROOMS STILL BATHROOMS , ’ ALWAYS TAD BIT UNSANITARY , RECENTLY ’ SEEN PROBLEM EXPAND ’ PRACTICALLY BECOME CRISIS . TODAY ADVOCATE STOP , ADVOCATE FUNDING TOWARDS BATHROOMS .

title_cleaned_nostopwords: JUSTICE TAMILS
description_nostopwords: DIASPORA TAMILS ​​ARE WORRIED HAPPENING DAY DAY SRI LANKA . EXAMPLE , NIGHT JANUARY 8 , 2021 , SRI LANKAN AUTHORITIES SNUCK JAFFNA UNIVERSITY USED BULLDOZER COMPLETELY DESTROY WAR MEMORIAL STATUE MADE SRI LANKAN TAMILS . STATUE MEAN LOT TAMILS ? LAST YEARS CIVIL WAR SRI LANKAN GOVERNMENT LIBERATION TIGERS TAMIL EELAM , 40,000 INNOCENT CIVILIANS CAPTURED MULLIVAIKAL BRUTALLY SLAUGHTERED TRIED FLEE FEAR LIVES.THE STATUE DESTROYED BUILT TRIBUTE TAMILS ​​WHO LOST LIVES PERIOD . ANOTHER , MUCH RECENT EXAMPLE : GROUNDS ANCIENT HINDU TEMPLE INVADED SRI LANKAN DEPARTMENT ARCHEOLOGY JANUARY 2021 . ACCOMPANIED SRI LANKAN ARMY , AGENTS ENTERED REGION KURUNTHUR ( MULLAITHEEVU ) REMOVING SCULPTURE RELATED HINDU WORSHIP , INSTALLED BUDDHA STATUE . -LANKA SILENCED . SENDING LETTER ADDRESSED UNITED NATIONS MEMBER STATES . UNITED NATIONS MEMBER STATES SUBJECT : 46TH SESSION HRC NEW RESOLUTION SRI LANKA , UNDERSIGNED , INCLUDE REPRESENTATIVES TAMIL COMMUNITY WELL INTERESTED ORGANIZATIONS CITIZENS , SPEAK BEHALF TAMILS ​​OF EELAM SRI LANKAN STATE , STATE-SPONSORED ACTORS , SECURITY FORCES COMMITTED MULTIPLE ACTS GENOCIDE SRI LANKA 'S INDEPENDENCE PRESENT DAY . SRI LANKA COMMITTED HEINOUS ACTS GENOCIDE 21ST CENTURY FINAL STAGES WAR 2008 2009 . CALL UNITED NATIONS MEMBER STATES : 1 . FIRMLY UNEQUIVOCALLY ADOPT TIME-BOUND RESOLUTION 46TH SESSION UNITED NATIONS HUMAN RIGHTS COUNCIL MANDATING INTERNATIONAL , IMPARTIAL INDEPENDENT INVESTIGATION CONDUCT SRI LANKAN STATE MILITARY OCCUPATION FINAL PHASE WAR , ONGOING ACTS GENOCIDE VIOLATION HUMAN RIGHTS . 2 . ADOPT UNITED NATIONS SECURITY COUNCIL AND/OR GENERAL ASSEMBLY RESOLUTION SIMILAR RESOLUTION , ADDITION REFERRING SRI LANKA INTERNATIONAL CRIMINAL COURT ( ICC ) . 3 . ACT QUICKLY SEVERELY PUNISH FOUND RESPONSIBLE ACTS GENOCIDE ABUSES , PUT PLACE PROTECTION MECHANISM HOPEFULLY PREVENT REPETITION ACTS VIOLENCE TAMIL COMMUNITY . MAKE REQUEST NOTING : 1 . SRI LANKAN STATE SECURITY FORCES ACCUSED COMMITTING GENOCIDE TAMILS ​​OF EELAM COMMITTING CRIMES HUMANITY , WAR CRIMES NUMEROUS HUMAN RIGHTS VIOLATIONS . PERSON EELAM TAMILS ​​ ( SEE ) ; 2 . SRI LANKA 'S WORST ATROCITIES COMMITTED 2009 , TENS THOUSANDS TAMIL CIVILIANS EELAM MASSACRED PREMEDITATED GENOCIDE . SRI LANKA DELIBERATELY UNDERESTIMATED TAMIL CIVILIAN POPULATION WAR ZONE ( SAYING 70,000 PEOPLE LIVED , INSTEAD 429,000 ) CUTTING FOOD MEDICINE SUPPLIES . SUBSEQUENTLY , ATTEMPTED DESTROY AREA HUNDREDS THOUSANDS CIVILIANS TAKEN REFUGE , ALTHOUGH SRI LANKAN GOVERNMENT ADMITTED HUNDRED LTTE FIGHTERS LIVED ( SEE ) ; 3 . 146,679 TAMIL CIVILIANS EELAM STILL MISSING LAST PHASE WAR , MANY MISSING SEIZED SRI LANKAN SECURITY FORCES ( SEE ) ; 4 . ALMOST 12 YEARS PASSED SINCE AFOREMENTIONED ACTS GENOCIDE , TANGIBLE PROGRESS MADE TOWARDS INDEPENDENT INVESTIGATION BEHAVIOR SRI LANKAN SECURITY FORCES , PASSAGE TIME HELPED SRI LANKA COVER ATROCITIES DESTROYING EVIDENCE ; 5 . PAST 12 YEARS , SRI LANKAN SECURITY FORCES ENJOYED COMPLETE IMPUNITY SRI LANKAN STATE EVADED RESPONSIBILITY , SETTING DANGEROUS PRECEDENT FUTURE ACTS GENOCIDE SRI LANKA ALSO ELSEWHERE ; 6 . ACTS GENOCIDE CONTINUE DAY , TAMILS ​​OF EELAM TARGET ABUSES RAPE , DIRE LIVING CONDITIONS ( ESPECIALLY AMONG INTERNALLY DISPLACED ) , ETHNOCIDE CLEANSING SYSTEMATIC ETHNICITY TAMILS ​​FROM LANDS STILL RIFE ; 7 . NAZI-LIKE MOTIVATION GENOCIDE ( IDEOLOGY SINHALESE PEOPLE `` CHOSEN PEOPLE '' THEREFORE SUPERIOR , SRI LANKA `` PROMISED LAND '' EELAM TAMILS ​​ARE THREAT ) , SUPPORTING STATE APPARATUS , COULD UNLEASH ACTS GENOCIDE EELAM TAMILS ​​AT TIME ; 8 . INTERNAL INVESTIGATION CONDUCT SRI LANKA WOULD INHERENTLY COMPROMISED , WOULD AMOUNT PERPETRATOR CRIME JUDGING INNOCENCE ; 9 . LASTING PEACE STABILITY REGION WITHOUT ACCOUNTABILITY REPARATION AFOREMENTIONED WAR CRIMES TAMIL CIVILIANS EELAM . PETITION STARTED LED NEXT GENERATION TAMIL DIASPORA . INFORMATION , PLEASE VISIT JUSTICEFOREELAM.ORG

HK $ 97.1 BILLION SHA TIN-CENTRAL RAIL LINK SCANDAL DEMONSTRATES EVIDENCE MISMANAGEMENT HIGHEST LEVEL MTR CORPORATION . 24/08/19 , MTR SHUTS 4 STATIONS AROUND LEGAL PROTEST KWUN TONG FOLLOWING POLITICAL PRESSURE CHINESE STATE MEDIA , SINCE LEAD RECENT MTR ’ POOR FINANCIAL PERFORMANCE . 21/07/19 MTR ’ INACTIONS INABILITY ADAPT EMERGENCIES ENDANGERED LIVES PASSENGERS TERRORIST ATTACK YUEN LONG STATION . 31/08/19 , RIOT POLICE STORMS PRINCE EDWARD STATION VIOLENTLY TACKLED SUSPECTED PROTESTERS , MTR ALLEGED COLLUSION POLICE COVER FATALITIES EVIDENCE POLICE BRUTALITY . 11/08/19 , MTR ALLOWS POLICE UNLAWFULLY FIRE TEAR GAS INSIDE FULLY OPERATIONAL KWAI FONG STATION , PASSENGERS STAFF SUFFERS EFFECTS TEAR GAS , PARTIES SHOWING LACK CONCERN HEALTH SAFETY PASSENGERS . 終止港鐵營運 CROSSRAIL ELIZABETH LINE 的14億英鎊合同 港鐵的子公司CROSS CROSSRAIL已獲得價值14億英鎊的營運新的伊麗莎白線合同，這是150億英鎊CROSSRAIL項目的第一大階段。 自TFL於2014年授予該特許權以來， 港鐵已有連翻營運及管理上的失誤， 在英國公眾期望獲得高水平的服務下 ，倫敦市長和TFL 應對MTR重新進行審查，並應該由於對MTR沒有信心去繼續履行合同而終止合同。 以下是終止本合同的六個關鍵原因及其營運失敗的證據： 2019年9月17日，在繁忙時段港鐵紅磡站有列車出軌引發混亂和乘客受傷，因為此港鐵難以維持運作。 HK $ 97.1BILLION沙田至中環線的一樁醜聞證明了地鐵公司管理不善的證據。 2019年8月24日，在中國施加壓力後，地鐵在觀塘的法律抗議活動附近關閉了4個車站。 港鐵在721元朗站發生恐怖襲擊時，顯示出完全無法應對緊急情況，危及乘客的生命。 2019年8月31日，防暴警察衝進太子站，並用暴力對付可疑的示威者，MTR被指與警察串通以掩飾死亡事件和警察殘暴的證據。 2019年8月11日，港鐵允許警察在葵芳火車站非法發射催淚彈，乘客和工作人員均受到催淚彈的影響。

LODGING APPLICATION REPEAL STRATEGIC CROPPING LAND ACT 2011 , QGC MAY NEGATE NEED COMPLY STRINGENT ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION MEASURES SET NEW LEGISLATION ( REGIONAL PLANNING INTERESTS ACT 2014 ) WANTING PURSUE CSG DEVELOPMENTS AREA . SOCIAL-DEMOCRAŢII ROMÂNI SUNT “ SOCIAL-DEMOCRAŢI ” DOAR CU NUMELE ŞI DISTRUG ÎNCREDEREA ÎN DEMOCRAŢIA SOCIALĂ DIN ÎNTREAGA EUROPA . EI AU PIERDUT SPRIJINUL OAMENILOR ŞI ACUM RECURG LA MĂSURI COERCITIVE PENTRU RĂMÂNE LA PUTERE . ÎN ULTIMELE LUNI , AU SCHIMBAT LEGILE JUSTIŢIEI PENTRU A-I SALVA PE POLITICIENII CORUPŢI DE LA ÎNCHISOARE ŞI , PRIN ACEASTA , AU SLĂBIT STATUL DE DREPT ÎN ROMÂNIA . MAI MULT , AU DEMIS-O PE ŞEFA DNA PENTRU OPRI PROCESUL DE CURĂŢARE CORUPŢIEI ÎN ROMÂNIA . ACUM , EI DORESC SĂ NUMEASCĂ PE CINEVA CARE SĂ LE URMEZE ORDINELE , LA FEL CUM AU FĂCUT CU POLIŢIA ŞI JANDARMERIA . ÎNTR-O ŢARĂ ÎN CARE MOR OAMENI NEVINOVAŢI , DIN CAUZA ADMINISTRĂRII CU REA-CREDINŢĂ ŞI INCOMPETENTE , SCHIMBĂRILE ÎN SISTEMUL JUDICIAR ŞI DEMITEREA ŞEFEI DNA AU ÎMPINS MILIOANE DE ROMÂNI DIN STRĂINĂTATE SĂ REACŢIONEZE PRIN ORGANIZAREA UNUI PROTEST , PE 10 AUGUST . EI AU DORIT PUR ŞI SIMPLU SĂ DEMONSTREZE CĂ ÎNCĂ LE PASĂ DE PERSOANELE PE CARE LE-AU LĂSAT ÎN URMĂ ÎN ROMÂNIA , PENTRU PROTESTA ÎMPOTRIVA POLITICIENILOR CORUPŢI ŞI PENTRU CERE PAŞNIC GUVERNULUI SĂ DEMISIONEZE . DIN NEFERICIRE , GUVERNUL SOCIAL-DEMOCRAT AVEA ALTE PLANURI ŞI DECIS SĂ FOLOSEASCĂ FORŢA JANDARMERIEI ÎMPOTRIVA OAMENILOR CARE S-AU ADUNAT ÎN PIAŢA VICTORIEI PENTRU PROTESTA PAŞNIC . PESTE 440 DE PERSOANE AU FOST RĂNITE DE JANDARMERIA CARE FOLOSIT TUNURI CU APĂ , GRENADE LACRIMOGENE , SPRAY CU PIPER ŞI ALTE GRENADE , PRECUM ŞI FORŢA DIRECTĂ . PRINTRE PERSOANELE RĂNITE SUNT BĂRBAŢI , FEMEI , COPII , VÂRSTNICI ŞI CHIAR PERSOANE CU DIZABILITĂŢI . DE ASEMENEA , PRINTRE PERSOANELE ATACATE SE GĂSESC REZIDENŢI DIN TOATE STATELE EUROPENE DE ORIGINE ROMÂNĂ . MULŢI PROTESTATARI AU FOST LUAŢI ÎN CUSTODIE DE CĂTRE JANDARMERIE PENTRU INSUFLA TEAMA ÎN PROTESTATARI ŞI PENTRU OPRI CONTINUAREA PROTESTULUI . DREPTUL DE PROTESTA , ASIGURAT DE CONVENŢIA EUROPEANĂ DREPTURILOR OMULUI ( ART.9-11 ) , ESTE ÎN PERICOL . EXISTĂ ZECI DE DOVEZI-VIDEO ONLINE DE LA PROTEST , CARE ARATĂ AMPLOAREA VIOLENŢEI LA CARE AU FOST EXPUŞI CETĂŢENII DIN ROMÂNIA ( PRINTRE CARE ŞI REZIDENŢI DIN DIASPORA ) . ESTE CLAR CĂ GUVERNUL SOCIAL-DEMOCRAT NU NICIO INTENŢIE DE DEMISIONA PAŞNIC IAR ACUM ÎNCEARCĂ SĂ CREEZE DIVIZIUNE ÎN SOCIETATEA ROMÂNEASCĂ , ADUCÂND INSTABILITATE LA GRANIŢA DE EST UNIUNII EUROPENE . LUÂND ÎN CONSIDERARE TOATE CELELALTE PROBLEME CU CARE SE CONFRUNTĂ EUROPA , ROMÂNIE INSTABILĂ ESTE ULTIMUL LUCRU PE CARE ÎL DORIŢI . ÎNTRE 3 ŞI 5 MILIOANE DE ROMÂNI AU PĂRĂSIT ŢARA PÂNĂ ACUM , DAR DACĂ ACEST LUCRU VA CONTINUA , NUMĂRUL ACESTORA AR PUTEA FI UŞOR DUBLAT . “ DECLARAŢIA PRINCIPIILOR ” PSE , CARE TREBUIE URMATĂ DE TOATE PARTIDELE MEMBRE , ESTE DISPREŢUITĂ DE SOCIAL-DEMOCRAŢII ROMÂNI , ÎN SPECIAL ART.1 DESPRE DEMOCRAŢIE , ART.2 DESPRE STATUL DE DREPT ŞI ART.3 DESPRE CONTROLUL OAMENILOR . DE ASEMENEA , DORI SĂ VĂ REAMINTIM ART.12 DESPRE SOLIDARITATEA INTERNAŢIONALĂ . “ ASIGURAREA PROSPERITĂŢII , STABILITĂŢII ŞI , MAI ALES , PĂCII DE LUNGĂ DURATĂ NECESITĂ COORDONARE EFICIENTĂ ÎN DOMENIUL INTERNAŢIONAL BAZAT PE DEMOCRAŢIE , RESPECT RECIPROC ŞI DREPTURILE OMULUI ” . LUÂND ÎN CONSIDERARE TOATE ACESTEA , NOI , CETĂŢENI EUROPENI , CONSIDERĂM CĂ SOCIAL-DEMOCRAŢII ROMÂNI NU MAI REPREZINTĂ PRINCIPIILE SOCIALISTE EUROPENE ŞI , PRIN URMARE , VĂ RUGĂM SĂ CEREŢI EXCLUDEREA LOR DIN PARTIDUL SOCIALIST EUROPEAN ŞI SĂ CONDAMNAŢI ACŢIUNILE LOR ÎMPOTRIVA POPORULUI ROMÂN . VERSIUNEA EN DEAR LEADERS SOCIAL-DEMOCRATS , LEADERS SOCIAL-DEMOCRATS , INFLUENCE PARTY EUROPEAN SOCIALISTS , POWER PROPOSE ROMANIAN SOCIAL-DEMOCRATS EXCLUDED . ROMANIAN SOCIAL-DEMOCRATS , “ SOCIAL-DEMOCRATS ” NAME RUINING TRUST SOCIAL DEMOCRACY EUROPE . LOST SUPPORT PEOPLE , RESORT COERCIVE MEASURES STAY POWER . PAST MONTHS , CHANGED JUDICIAL LAW ORDER SAVE CORRUPT POLITICIANS JAILED , WEAKENED RULE LAW ROMANIA . CLEAR , SOCIAL-DEMOCRAT GOVERNMENT INTENTION RESIGNING PEACE , TRYING CREATE DIVIDE ROMANIAN SOCIETY , BRINGING INSTABILITY EASTERN BORDER EUROPEAN UNION . CONSIDERING PROBLEMS EUROPE FACING , UNSTABLE ROMANIA LAST THING WANT . 3 5 MILLION ROMANIANS LEFT COUNTRY FAR , CONTINUES , NUMBERS COULD EASILY DOUBLE . “ DECLARATION PRINCIPLES ” PES , MUST FOLLOWED MEMBER PARTIES , KEPT DISDAIN ROMANIAN SOCIAL-DEMOCRATS , ESPECIALLY ART.1 DEMOCRACY , ART.2 RULE LAW ART.3 CONTROL PEOPLE . ALSO , WOULD LIKE REMIND ART.12 INTERNATIONAL SOLIDARITY . “ ENSURING LONG LASTING PROSPERITY , STABILITY , PEACE REQUIRES EFFECTIVE COORDINATION INTERNATIONAL REALM BASED DEMOCRACY , MUTUAL RESPECT HUMAN RIGHTS. ” TAKING CONSIDERATION , , CONCERNED EUROPEAN CITIZENS , FEEL ROMANIAN SOCIAL DEMOCRATIC REPRESENT EUROPEAN SOCIALIST PRINCIPLES ANYMORE THUS , KINDLY ASK PRESSURE EXCLUSION EUROPEAN SOCIALIST PARTY CONDEMN ACTIONS PEOPLE ROMANIA . ÖVER 440 MÄNNISKOR SKADADES NÄR KRAVALLPOLIS ANVÄNDE SIG AV VATTENKANONER , GRANATER MED TÅRGAS , ANDRA TYPER AV GRANATER , PEPPARSPRAY OCH DIREKT VÅLD . BLAND DE SÅRADE FANNS MÄN , KVINNOR , BARN , ÄLDRE OCH HANDIKAPPADE . BLAND DE SKADADE FANNS ÄVEN SVENSKA MEDBORGARE . MÅNGA DEMONSTRANTER FÄNGSLADES AV POLIS , FÖR ATT SKAPA RÄDSLA OCH FÖRHINDRA FORTSATTA DEMONSTRATIONER . RÄTTEN ATT DEMONSTRERA , SOM STYRKS AV DEN EUROPEISKA MÄNNISKORÄTTSKONVENTIONEN ( ARTIKEL 9-11 ) , ÄR SÅLEDES DIREKT HOT . DET FINNS DUSSINTALS MED VIDEOBEVIS SOM PÅVISAR VIDDEN AV DET ÖVERVÅLD SOM RUMÄNSKA LIKVÄL SOM SVENSKA MEDBORGARE UTSATTES FÖR . DET STÅR NU KLART ATT DEN SOCIALDEMOKRATISKA REGERINGEN RUMÄNIEN INTE ÄMNAR ATT FREDLIGT AVGÅ . ISTÄLLET VERKAR DE FÖR ATT SPLITTRA DEN RUMÄNSKA BEFOLKNINGEN , OCH SKAPA INSTABILITET DEN EUROPEISKA UNIONENS ÖSTRA GRÄNS . MED TANKE PÅ DE UTMANINGAR DEN EUROPEISKA UNIONEN REDAN STÅR INFÖR , LIGGER DET ALLAS INTRESSE ATT BEHÅLLA ETT STABILT RUMÄNIEN . MELLAN 3 OCH 5 MILJONER RUMÄNER HAR HITTILLS LÄMNAT LANDET , MEN OM DESSA OROLIGHETER FÅR FORTSÄTTA , KAN DETTA SNABBT FÖRDUBBLAS . DE EUROPEISKA SOCIALDEMOKRATERNAS PRINCIPDEKLARATION , VILKA SKALL FÖLJAS AV ALLA MEDLEMMAR , UPPEHÅLLS INTE AV DET RUMÄNSKA SOCIALDEMOKRATISKA PARTIET - SYNNERHET INTE ARTIKEL 1 OM DEMOKRATI , ARTIKEL 2 OM LAG OCH RÄTT , SAMT ARTIKEL 3 OM MEDBORGARES RÄTTIGHETER . DÄRUTÖVER ÖNSKAR VI PÅMINNA DIG OM DEN ARTIKEL SOM BEHANDLAR INTERNATIONELL SOLIDARITET : ” ENSURING LONG LASTING PROSPERITY , STABILITY , , PEACE REQUIRES EFFECTIVE COORDINATION INTERNATIONAL REALM BASED DEMOCRACY , MUTUAL RESPECT HUMAN RIGHTS. ” MED ALLT DETTA TAGET BEAKTNING MENAR VI , BEKYMRADE EUROPEISKA- OCH SVENSKA MEDBORGARE , ATT DE RUMÄNSKA SOCIALDEMOKRATERNA INTE REPRESENTERAR DE EUROPEISKA SOCIALDEMOKRATISKA PRINCIPERNA , OCH DÄRFÖR VILL VI VÄNLIGAST DIG OM ATT EXKLUDERA DEM FRÅN DE EUROPEISKA SOCIALDEMOKRATERNA SAMT FÖRDÖMA DERAS HANDLINGAR GENTEMOT DET RUMÄNSKA FOLKET . MED VÄNLIG HÄLSNING , TRADUS SI SUSTINUT DE ERIKA LEFTER VOR MAI APAREA CURAND SI ALTELE ! STAY TUNED ! title_cleaned_nostopwords: PRESIDENT KAZAKHSTAN , SAY ANIMAL CONCENTRATION CAMPS COUNTRY ! ( SEE ENG )
description_nostopwords: ANIMALS WAITING DEATH HORRIFIC . ANIMALS GET RIDDLED INFECTIONS , FOOD
full_content_nostopwords: МЫ ПРОВОДИМ ПОСЛЕДНИЙ ВЕЧЕР В ОЖИДАНИИ ХОЛОКОСТА , УТРОМ НАМИ РАСТОПЯТ ПЕЧИ , СДЕЛАВ СОННОЕ НЕБО ПЁСТРЫМ ... И НИКТО БОЛЬШЕ НЕ ОЦЕНИТ НАШУ ПРЕДАННОСТЬ , НАШУ ДРУЖБУ , БУДЕМ ЖАТЬСЯ В УГЛАХ , КАК ТЕНИ И СКВОЗЬ ПРУТЬЯ ГЛЯДЕТЬ НАРУЖУ ... ПУТЬ ПОД ЗЕМЛЮ НЕМНОГО ТРУДЕН , ЕСЛИ ДОЛЖЕН ПРОЙТИ СКВОЗЬ ПЛАМЯ . ЗАВТРА УТРОМ ПРИБУДУТ ЛЮДИ , ЧТОБЫ ВЫТАЩИТЬ НАС ИЗ КАМЕР ... БУДУТ БИТЬ НАС ПОД РЁБРА , ВЕРЯ , ЧТО ПРЕД НИМИ МЫ ВИНОВАТЫ . САМЫМ РЬЯНЫМ РАЗМАЖУТ ЧЕРЕП ПРОРЖАВЕВШЕЙ СТАЛЬНОЙ ЛОПАТОЙ ... В НАШИХ ДУШАХ СГОРИТ ЖИВОЕ , ВСПЫХНЕТ КОЖА И ЛОПНУТ ВЕНЫ , МЫ , ЗАЙДЯСЬ СУМАСШЕДШИМ ВОЕМ , ПРИПАДЁМ К РАСКАЛЁННЫМ СТЕНАМ ... ВРЯД ЛИ КТО-ТО ПОСМЕЕТ ПЛАКАТЬ . ВРЯД ЛИ КТО-ТО ВООБЩЕ ОСУДИТ . НУ КОНЕЧНО ... Я ЛИШЬ СОБАКА . НО И ЛЮДИ - ВСЕГО ЛИШЬ ЛЮДИ ... АЛЕКСАНДР САБУРОВ МЫ ОБРАЩАЕМСЯ К ВАМ С ПРОСЬБОЙ ЗАЩИТИТЬ ТЫСЯЧИ ЗАМУЧЕННЫХ ЖИВОТНЫХ КАЗАХСТАНА , ГДЕ ЕЖЕДНЕВНО ОТЛОВЫ СЖИГАЮТ В ПЕЧАХ СОТНИ СОБАК И КОШЕК . ЗАЧАСТУЮ ЕЩЁ ЖИВЫХ . В КАЗАХСТАНЕ XXI ВЕКА ВАРВАРСКОЕ ОТНОШЕНИЕ К ЖИВОТНЫМ - ЭТО НОРМА . ЗАКОНА ОБ ИХ ЗАЩИТЕ НЕТ . ДЛЯ МНОГИХ ЖИТЕЛЕЙ КАЗАХСТАНА ЖИВОТНОЕ - ЭТО МУСОР , СОРНЯК И ЖИЗНЬ ЕГО НИЧЕГО НЕ СТОИТ . ЛЮБОЙ ЖИТЕЛЬ СТРАНЫ МОЖЕТ ПОЗВОНИТЬ В ОТЛОВ И СООБЩИТЬ О БЕЗДОМНОМ ЖИВОТНОМ , ЗАРАНЕЕ ОБРЕКАЯ ЕГО НА НЕИЗБЕЖНУЮ ГИБЕЛЬ . КРАТКО О СИТУАЦИИ В КАЗАХСТАНЕ . 1 . В КАЗАХСТАНЕ НЕ РАБОТАЕТ ЗАКОН О ЗАЩИТЕ ПРАВ ЖИВОТНЫХ . 2 . В КАЗАХСТАНЕ НЕ РАБОТАЮТ ПРОГРАММЫ СТЕРИЛИЗАЦИИ И ВАКЦИНАЦИИ . 3 . В КАЗАХСТАНЕ НЕТ ПРЕДСТАВИТЕЛЬСТВ МЕЖДУНАРОДНЫХ ОРГАНИЗАЦИЙ ПО ЗАЩИТЕ ЖИВОТНЫХ . 4 . В КАЗАХСТАНЕ НЕТ ЕДИНОГО ЗООЗАЩИТНОГО ДВИЖЕНИЯ . 5 . ВОЛОНТЕРСКИЕ ГРУППЫ В КАЗАХСТАНЕ СУЩЕСТВУЮТ , НО ИХ УСИЛИЯ ПО СПАСЕНИЮ ЖИВОТНЫХ СЛИШКОМ РАЗРОЗНЕННЫ И ХАОТИЧНЫ . МЕЖДУ ВОЛОНТЕРАМИ НЕТ СПЛОЧЁННОСТИ В БОРЬБЕ ЗА ОБЩЕЕ ДЕЛО , И ПОЭТОМУ , СПАСАЯ МНОГИХ ЖИВОТНЫХ , ОНИ НЕ МОГУТ ПОМОЧЬ ВСЕМ . 6 . ВОЛОНТЕРЫ ИЗ РАЗНЫХ СТРАН ПЫТАЮТСЯ ПОМОЧЬ ЖИВОТНЫМ КАЗАХСТАНА . ОНИ СПАСАЮТ СОБАК И КОШЕК ИЗ ОТЛОВОВ И ДОБИВАЮТСЯ ИЗМЕНЕНИЯ ЗАКОНОДАТЕЛЬСТВА СТРАНЫ . НО , НАХОДЯСЬ ЗА ТЫСЯЧИ КИЛОМЕТРОВ ОТ КАЗАХСТАНА , ВОЛОНТЕРАМ ТРУДНО ПОВЛИЯТЬ НА СИТУАЦИЮ ПО ТЕЛЕФОНУ И ЧЕРЕЗ ИНТЕРНЕТ . КАК ИТОГ , РЕЗУЛЬТАТЫ ИХ ДЕЯТЕЛЬНОСТИ НЕЗНАЧИТЕЛЬНЫ . ФИНАНСОВЫЕ ВОЗМОЖНОСТИ ВОЛОНТЕРОВ ОГРАНИЧЕНЫ , И ПОЭТОМУ КОЛИЧЕСТВО ВЫВОЗИМЫХ ИЗ ОТЛОВОВ ЖИВОТНЫХ МИНИМАЛЬНО . 7 . УБИЙСТВО БЕЗДОМНЫХ ЖИВОТНЫХ В КАЗАХСТАНЕ ПРЕВРАТИЛОСЬ В МАСШТАБНЫЙ БИЗНЕС . ГОСУДАРСТВО ПЛАТИТ ОТЛОВАМ ЗА КАЖДОГО ПОЙМАННОГО И ЗАБИТОГО ИМИ ЗВЕРЯ . ПЕРЕДЕРЖКИ СОБАК , ВЕТЕРИНАРНЫЕ КЛИНИКИ , ЗООТАКСИ - ВСЕ НАЖИВАЮТСЯ НА ВОЛОНТЁРАХ , ВЫНУЖДЕННЫХ ПОЛЬЗОВАТЬСЯ ИХ УСЛУГАМИ ДЛЯ СПАСЕНИЯ ЖИВОТНЫХ . ЧТО ПРОИСХОДИТ НА УЛИЦАХ КАЗАХСТАНА ? СОТРУДНИКИ ОТЛОВОВ `` ВЫХОДЯТ НА ОХОТУ '' ЕЖЕДНЕВНО . ОНИ ХВАТАЮТ ВСЕХ , КТО ПОПАДЕТСЯ У НИХ НА ПУТИ : ВЗРОСЛЫХ ОСОБЕЙ , ЩЕНКОВ И КОТЯТ . РАБОТНИКИ ИЗОЛЯТОРОВ ВРЕМЕННОГО СОДЕРЖАНИЯ ( КАК ОНИ ОФИЦИАЛЬНО СЕБЯ НАЗЫВАЮТ ) ЗАБИРАЮТ И ДОМАШНИХ ЖИВОТНЫХ - В ОТЛОВАХ МНОГО СОБАК В ОШЕЙНИКАХ . ПОЙМАННЫМ ЖИВОТНЫМ ДАЕТСЯ В СРЕДНЕМ ТРИ ДНЯ , ЧТОБЫ ИМ УЛЫБНУЛАСЬ УДАЧА И ЗА НИМИ ПРИШЕЛ СПАСИТЕЛЬ ( ХОЗЯИН ИЛИ ВОЛОНТЁР ) . ДЛЯ ОСТАЛЬНЫХ ИСХОД ОДИН – МУЧИТЕЛЬНАЯ СМЕРТЬ . СОГЛАСНО ЗАКОНОДАТЕЛЬСТВУ КАЗАХСТАНА , ЖИВОТНЫЕ ДОЛЖНЫ СОДЕРЖАТЬСЯ В ОТЛОВАХ В ТЕЧЕНИЕ 60 СУТОК С ТЕМ , ЧТОБЫ НАШЕЛСЯ ИХ ВЛАДЕЛЕЦ . ЕСЛИ ХОЗЯИН НЕ НАЙДЕН , ТО ЗВЕРЬ ОФИЦИАЛЬНО ПРИОБРЕТАЕТ СТАТУС НИЧЕЙНОГО , И ТОГДА ОТЛОВ , КАК НОВЫЙ СОБСТВЕННИК , ПРИНИМАЕТ РЕШЕНИЕ О СУДЬБЕ УЗНИКА . НО В РЕАЛЬНОСТИ ВСЕ НЕ ТАК ! ЖИВОТНЫХ ОТСТРЕЛИВАЮТ ПРЯМО НА УЛИЦАХ ИЛИ ДОСТАВЛЯЮТ В ИЗОЛЯТОРЫ И УНИЧТОЖАЮТ В ТЕЧЕНИЕ 2-3 ДНЕЙ . 50 СОБАК И 100 ЩЕНКОВ ЗА ДЕНЬ В ОТЛОВЕ – ОБЫЧНОЕ ДЕЛО . УСЛОВИЯ СОДЕРЖАНИЯ В ТАКИХ КОНЦЛАГЕРЯХ АДСКИЕ . ЗАЧАСТУЮ ЖИВОТНЫХ НЕ КОРМЯТ И НЕ ДАЮТ ИМ ВОДЫ . СИДЯ НА БЕТОННОМ ПОЛУ КЛЕТОК , СОБАКИ ЗАМЕРЗАЮТ НАСМЕРТЬ . НА СВОИХ СТРАНИЦАХ В ИНСТАГРАМ ОТЛОВЫ ПУБЛИКУЮТ ФОТО СОБАК , КОШЕК , КОТЯТ И ЩЕНКОВ , ОЖИДАЮЩИХ СМЕРТЬ - ГЛАЗА ЖИВОТНЫХ НАПОЛНЕНЫ БОЛЬЮ И УЖАСОМ . КАК ЖИВОТНЫХ УБИВАЮТ ? ОТЛОВЫ ОЧЕНЬ ЖЕСТОКИ ПО ОТНОШЕНИЮ К ЖИВОТНЫМ . ПЕТЛИ , ИСПОЛЬЗУЕМЫЕ ДЛЯ ИХ ПОИМКИ , ЛОМАЮТ ШЕИ , ДУШАТ И ПЕРЕРЕЗАЮТ ИМ ГОРЛО . ОТСТРЕЛ СОБАК И КОШЕК ОТРАВЛЕННЫМИ ДРОТИКАМИ ИЛИ ПУЛЯМИ – ЭТО ВПОЛНЕ СТАНДАРТНАЯ СИТУАЦИЯ . В ОТЛОВАХ ДЛЯ УБИЙСТВ ИСПОЛЬЗУЕТСЯ МИОРЕЛАКСАНТ , ПОД ДЕЙСТВИЕМ КОТОРОГО ЖИВОТНОЕ ДОЛГО И МУЧИТЕЛЬНО ЗАДЫХАЕТСЯ - ЭТО В ЛУЧШЕМ СЛУЧАЕ . В ХУДШЕМ - КОШЕК И СОБАК КИДАЮТ В ПЕЧЬ ЕЩЁ ЖИВЫМИ . КАК МОЖНО ПРЕДСТАВИТЬ СЕБЕ ТАКУЮ ПЫТКУ В XXI ВЕКЕ ? ЛИЦА , СОВЕРШАЮЩИЕ ПОДОБНОЕ , В БОЛЬШИНСТВЕ СТРАН ЦИВИЛИЗОВАННОГО МИРА СЧИТАЮТСЯ ПСИХОПАТАМИ . А ЧТО ЖЕ ВЛАСТИ КАЗАХСТАНА ? ВЛАСТИ ОСТАЮТСЯ РАВНОДУШНЫМИ К СТРАДАНИЯМ ЖИВОТНЫХ , И ОНИ ЖЕСТОКИ В СВОЕМ БЕЗДЕЙСТВИИ . БРИДЖИТ БАРДО В 2019 ГОДУ В УЖАСЕ И ОТЧАЯНИИ ОБРАТИЛАСЬ К ПРЕЗИДЕНТУ КАЗАХСТАНА И , ССЫЛАЯСЬ НА ПРОДОЛЖАЮЩИЕ ПОСТУПАТЬ К НЕЙ ОТЗЫВЫ ПО ПОВОДУ ГИБЕЛИ СОБАК И КОШЕК В ЭТОЙ СТРАНЕ , ПРОСИЛА ГЛАВУ ГОСУДАРСТВА ОЗАБОТИТЬСЯ СУДЬБОЙ ЖИВОТНЫХ . ДЛЯ ЭТОГО ОНА ПРЕДЛАГАЛА ПОМОЩЬ СПЕЦИАЛИСТОВ СВОЕГО ФОНДА ( HTTPS : //TENGRINEWS.KZ/WORLD_NEWS/BRIJIT-BARDO-POJALOVALAS-TOKAEVU-JESTOKOE-OBRASCHENIE-386681/ ) . В СВОЕМ ОТВЕТЕ БРИДЖИТ БАРДО В ФЕВРАЛЕ 2020 ГОДА , ПРЕЗИДЕНТ КАЗАХСТАНА КАСЫМ-ЖОМАРТ КЕМЕЛЕВИЧ ТОКАЕВ РАССУЖДАЛ О МИЛОСЕРДИИ НАЦИИ И О НЕОБХОДИМОСТИ УДЕЛЯТЬ ВНИМАНИЕ ЗАЩИТЕ ЖИВОТНЫХ . ОН ТАКЖЕ ОБЕЩАЛ ИЗДАТЬ ЗАКОН О ПРАВАХ ЖИВОТНЫХ ( HTTPS : //LITER.KZ/TOKAEV-OTVETIL-NA-PISMO-BRIZHIT-BARDO-OBRATIVSHEJSYA-S-PROSBOJ-O-ZASHHITE-ZHIVOTNYH/ ) . 1 МАРТА 2022 В КАЗАХСТАНЕ ВСТУПИЛ В СИЛУ ЗАКОН О ЗАЩИТЕ ЖИВОТНЫХ . НО ОН НЕ РАБОТАЕТ , И СТРАДАНИЯ ЖИВОТНЫХ ПРОДОЛЖАЮТСЯ : ИХ СМЕРТЬ И МУЧЕНИЯ ПОВСЮДУ . НИКЕМ НЕ КОНТРОЛИРУЕМЫЕ ОТЛОВЫ ПРОДОЛЖАЮТ ЗВЕРСТВОВАТЬ И ОБЕЩАЮТ СВОИМ ПОДПИСЧИКАМ В ИНСТАГРАМ НОВЫЙ `` ИНТЕРЕСНЫЙ '' ПОВОРОТ В РАЗВИТИИ ДРАМЫ ПОД НАЗВАНИЕМ `` ЗООФАШИЗМ В КАЗАХСТАНЕ '' ! КАК ЖЕ ТАК , УВАЖАЕМЫЙ КАСЫМ-ЖОМАРТ КЕМЕЛЕВИЧ ТОКАЕВ ? ГДЕ ЖЕ ОНО , ТАК ГОРДО ВАМИ ЗАЯВЛЕННОЕ МИРУ МИЛОСЕРДИЕ НАЦИИ ? ПОЧЕМУ ОТЛОВЫ НЕ СОБЛЮДАЮТ ПРОПИСАННЫЙ ПРАВИЛАМИ 60-ДНЕВНЫЙ СРОК СОДЕРЖАНИЯ ЖИВОТНЫХ , УБИВАЯ ИХ УЖЕ ЧЕРЕЗ ТРИ ДНЯ ? И ЭТО ЛИШЬ САМЫЙ МАЛЫЙ ИЗ ИХ ГРЕХОВ ! КАКОВЫ ПУТИ РЕШЕНИЯ ПРОБЛЕМЫ НЕГУМАННОГО ОТНОШЕНИЯ К ЖИВОТНЫМ В КАЗАХСТАНЕ ? 1 . ПРЕЗИДЕНТ И ПРАВИТЕЛЬСТВО КАЗАХСТАНА ДОЛЖНЫ ДОРАБОТАТЬ ЗАКОН О ЗАЩИТЕ ЖИВОТНЫХ И КОНТРОЛИРОВАТЬ ЕГО ИСПОЛНЕНИЕ . 2 . ПРЕЗИДЕНТ ДОЛЖЕН ПРЕКРАТИТЬ УНИЧТОЖЕНИЕ БРОДЯЧИХ ЖИВОТНЫХ . 3 . title_cleaned_nostopwords: PUNISH MURDERER DRAGGED DOG DEATH HYUNDAI GALLOPER SANGJU , KOREA
description_nostopwords: STRAY DOGS , DEVASTATING ANIMAL CRUELTY USING VEHICLE OCCURRED , TIME SANGJU OBVIOUS EGREGIOUS CASE ANIMAL CRUELTY MUST INVESTIGATED PROSECUTED . PLEASE STAND KOREAN ANIMAL WELFARE ASSOCIATION SIGNING PETITION CALLING SANGJU KOREAN ANIMAL WELFARE ASSOCIATION ( KAWA ) NON PERMETTERÀ TALE ATROCITÀ VENGA DIMENTICATA E HA LANCIATO
full_content_nostopwords: CALL ACTION : PUNISH MURDERER DRAGGED DOG DEATH HYUNDAI GALLOPER SANGJU , SOUTH KOREA ! HTTPS : //KOREANDOGS.ORG/DOG-DRAGGED-TO-DEATH-SANGJU/ PLEASE SIGN PETITION URGING PROSECUTION PERSON DRAGGED DOG DEATH SANGJU , GYEONGSANGBUK-DO PROVINCE , SOUTH KOREA . AMID PAIN ANGER RESULTED VAN DELIBERATELY DROVE FAMILY STRAY DOGS , DEVASTATING ANIMAL CRUELTY USING VEHICLE OCCURRED , TIME SANGJU , GYEONGSANGBUK-DO . MARCH 7 , 2021 , DRIVER WITNESSED HYUNDAI GALLOPER DRIVING NEARLY 80 KM/H DOG ROPE AROUND NECK DRAGGED BEHIND . RAN FAST COULD KEEP ’ STAND CHANCE . VEHICLE MOMENTARILY STOPPED , WITNESS CLOSELY OBSERVED DOG FOUND FOUR PAWS SHREDDED , SOAKED BLOOD . APPEARED MOTIONLESS LIKELY DEAD . OBVIOUS EGREGIOUS CASE ANIMAL CRUELTY MUST INVESTIGATED PROSECUTED FULLEST EXTENT LAW . LET US LET HORRENDOUS DEATH DEFENSELESS DOG VAIN . PLEASE STAND KOREAN ANIMAL WELFARE ASSOCIATION SIGNING PETITION CALLING SANGJU POLICE PROSECUTION SERVICE DAEGU DISTRICT , SANGJU BRANCH LAUNCH FULL INVESTIGATION HOLD EVILDOER ACCOUNTABLE . CLICK LEARN CALL ACTION . HTTPS : //KOREANDOGS.ORG/DOG-DRAGGED-TO-DEATH-SANGJU/ KAWA 'S POST FACEBOOK : HTTPS : //WWW.FACEBOOK.COM/ANIMALKOREA/POSTS/4118401938192719HTTPS : //WWW.FACEBOOK.COM/ANIMALKOREA/POSTS/4115600431806203 ITALIAN TRANSLATION : INVITO ’ AZIONE : PUNIRE L ’ ASSASSINO CHE HA TRASCINATO CON UNA MACCHINA UN CANE ALLA MORTE SANGJU , SOUTH KOREA SEGUITO AL CASO DEL FURGONE CHE INVESTI ’ UNA FAMIGLIA DI CANI RANDAGI , C ' È STATO UN ALTRO INCIDENTE DI CRUDELTÀ VERSO CANI.UN CANE ERA LEGATO ALLA PARTE POSTERIORE DI UN VEICOLO CHE GUIDAVA QUASI 80 KM ALL'ORA.MORÌ CON LE ZAMPE DECIMATE E INZUPPATE DI SANGUE CAUSA DAL TRASCINAMENTO.LA KOREAN ANIMAL WELFARE ASSOCIATION ( KAWA ) NON PERMETTERÀ TALE ATROCITÀ VENGA DIMENTICATA E HA LANCIATO UNA PETIZIONE AFFINCHÉ QUELL ’ ASSASSINO NON RIMANGA IMPUNITO.PER FAVORE , PRENDETEVI UN MOMENTO PER UNIRVI KAWA . TRADUZIONE DELLA PETIZIONE : FIRMA LA PETIZIONE PER SOLLECITARE L'ACCUSA PER CHI HA TRASCINATO UN CANE ALLA SUA MORTE SANGJU , PROVINCIA DI GYEONGSANGBUK-DO , COREA DEL SUD.TRA IL DOLORE E LA RABBIA PROVOCATI QUANDO UN FURGONE DELIBERATAMENTE INVESTI ’ UNA FAMIGLIA DI CANI RANDAGI , SI E ’ VERIFICATO UN ALTRO DEVASTANTE CASO DI CRUDELTÀ SUGLI ANIMALI COL USO DI UN VEICOLO , QUESTA VOLTA SANGJU , GYEONGSANGBUK-DO . IL 7 MARZO 2021 , UNA PERSONA HA ASSISTITO AL FATTO CHE UNA HYUNDAI GALLOPER , GUIDANDO QUASI 80 KM / H , TRASCINAVA DIETRO UN CANE CON UNA CORDA AL COLLO.CORSE PIÙ VELOCE CHE POTEVA PER TENERE IL PASSO , NON AVEVA ALCUNA POSSIBILITÀ.CON IL VEICOLO MOMENTANEAMENTE FERMO , IL TESTIMONE HA OSSERVATO DA VICINO IL CANE E HA TROVATO LE SUE QUATTRO ZAMPE BRANDELLI , INTRISE DI SANGUE.SEMBRAVA IMMOBILE E PROBABILMENTE ERA MORTA QUESTO È UN OVVIO ED ECLATANTE CASO DI CRUDELTÀ SUGLI ANIMALI CHE DEVE ESSERE INDAGATO E PERSEGUITO NELLA MISURA MASSIMA CONSENTITA DALLA LEGGE.NON LASCIAMO CHE L'ORRENDA MORTE DI QUESTO CANE INDIFESO SIA STATO INVANO.PER FAVORE , SCHIERATEVI CON L'ASSOCIAZIONE KAWA CHE SI OCCUPA DEL BENESSERE DEGLI ANIMALI , FIRMANDO LA PETIZIONE CHE CHIEDE ALLA POLIZIA DI SANGJU ED ALL'UFFICIO DEL PROCURATORE DISTRETTUALE DI DAEGU DI AVVIARE UN'INDAGINE COMPLETA PER RITENERE RESPONSABILE QUESTO MISERABILE . INVITO ’ AZIONE : HTTPS : //KOREANDOGS.ORG/DOG-DRAGGED-TO-DEATH-SANGJU-ITALIAN/ KAWA ’ PETITION KOREAN ‘ 경북 상주 차량에 개를 묶어 끌고 다니다 죽게 한 학대 사건 ’ 엄중처벌 탄원 서명 “ 시속 60~80KM 되는 차량에 이끌려 살기 위해 달렸지만 결국 피투성이가 된 네 발로 죽음을 맞이한 빨간 발의 개 ” 승합차 유기견 학대 사건의 아픔과 분노가 여전한 가운데 차량을 이용한 참혹한 동물 학대 사건이 경북 상주에서 연이어 발생했습니다 . 지난 7일 , 갤로퍼 차량이 개의 목에 끈을 묶어 뒤편에 매단 채 시속 60~80킬로로 달리는 모습을 목격하여 해당 차량의 뒤를 쫓았고 , 학대 차량이 지나간 길에는 피가 흥건한 것을 목격했다고 합니다 . 차량이 잠시 정차한 틈을 타 자세히 확인해보니 개는 네 발이 모두 뭉개져 보랏빛피투성이가 되어 있었으며 차량에 끌려다녔던 개는 당시 이미 죽은 것인지 미동조차 없는 처참한 상태였습니다 . 차량 블랙박스 영상 속 개의 몸통에는 특별히 외상이 없었으나 네 다리는 피투성이가 되어 있었습니다 . 이는 학대자가 살아 있는 개를 차에 묶어 달렸고 , 목이 묶인 개는 차량 속도를 따라잡으려 죽을힘을 다해 달리다가 결국 사망한 것으로 추정됩니다 . 이것은 ‘ 노상에서 잔인한 방식으로 동물을 죽음에 이르게 한 명백한 동물학대 사건 ’ 입니다 . 시민 여러분 , 차량 운전자 즉 학대자는 생명의 존엄성에 대한 인식이 전혀 존재하지 않았습니다 . 과연 자신의 소중한 개라면 이렇게까지 할 수 있었을까요 ? 개의 상태를 단 한 번이라도 확인해 봤다면 이런 안타깝게 죽음에 이르게 하지도 않았을 것입니다 . 자유롭게 뛰어놀아야 할 개는 억지로 목이 묶여 살기 위해 뛰었습니다 . 빨간 발의 개는 숨이 찰 때까지 뛰고 또 뛰었지만 , 마음처럼 따라주지 않는 피로 흥건한 발이 원망스러웠을 겁니다 . 빨간 발이 된 개의 죽음이 헛되지 않도록 여러분들께서 동물자유연대와 함께 목소리를 높여주시고 , 학대자가 저지른 죄에 대한 응당한 대가를 치를 수 있도록 탄원 서명에 함께 동참해주시길 간곡히 부탁드립니다 . 이 서명은 사건 수사를 담당할 상주경찰서 및 대구지검 상주지청에 철저한 수사와 엄중처벌을 촉구하기 위해 제출할 예정입니다 . CLICK PETITION KOREAN : HTTPS : //BIT.LY/3RQSVHW

full_content_nostopwords: FARM ANIMAL RESCUE REGISTERED CHARITY SANCTUARY ANIMALS RESCUED STARVATION , DANGER ABUSE . QUEENSLAND GOVERNMENT MADE DECISION BAN VISITORS FARM ANIMAL RESCUE UNLESS SPEND $ 300,000 ADDING ADDITIONAL LANE DAYBORO ROAD , HIGHWAY MANAGED QUEENSLAND TRANSPORT MAIN ROADS . SUPPORTERS DONATE CHARITY HELP ANIMALS , IMPROVE STATES ' HIGHWAY INFRASTRUCTURE . REGARDLESS , N'T $ 300,000 SPEND . FACT MUCH MAKE DONATIONS CONTRIBUTIONS YEAR . QUEENSLAND GOVERNMENT REQUIRING ACTION `` SAFETY '' . AVERAGE ONE VISITOR VEHICLE ARRIVE FARM DAY . OPPOSED NEIGHBOURS RECEIVE 400 VISITOR VEHICLES PER DAY , INCLUDING HEAVY VEHICLES , ADDITIONAL LANE HIGHWAY OUTSIDE PREMISES . FACT TOLD EVEN ZERO INCREASED VISITOR VOLUME , WOULD REQUIRED CARRY CONSTRUCTION HIGHWAY ABLE AVOID VISITOR BAN . TOTAL CONFIDENCE CURRENT SUPPORTERS STAYING US , FEASIBLE US MAINTAIN SANCTUARY FORCED TELL NEW SUPPORTERS SEE WORK . FINANCIAL PROJECTIONS SHOW ULTIMATELY REQUIREMENT CAUSE SANCTUARY CLOSE . ASK JACKIE TRAD , DEPUTY PREMIER MINISTER TRANSPORT PLANNING , INSTRUCT TEAM FIND WAY MAINTAIN VISITOR ACCESS SANCTUARY WITHOUT NEED DEVELOP STATE 'S HIGHWAY INFRASTRUCTURE . THANK SUPPORT . ទោះបីជារបបខ្មែរក្រហមដ៏ឃោរឃៅបានដួលរលំទៅអស់រយៈពេលជាង ៤០ឆ្នាំហើយក៏ដោយ ប៉ុន្តែការសម្លាប់ក្រៅប្រព័ន្ធតុលាការនៅតែបន្តកើតមានយ៉ាងច្រើនជាបន្តបន្ទាប់។ របបដឹកនាំរបស់លោក ហ៊ុន សែន ក្នុងប្រទេសកម្ពុជា នៅតែប្រើប្រាស់វិធីសាស្រ្តខ្មែរក្រហម ដើម្បីបំបិទមាត់គូប្រជែង និងអ្នកប្រឆាំងនឹងនយោបាយរបស់ខ្លួន។ គ្មានឡើយការស៊ើបអង្កេតតាមផ្លូវច្បាប់ប្រកបដោយឯករាជ្យចំពោះរាល់ការសម្លាប់ដែលមានការពាក់ព័ន្ធនឹងលោក ហ៊ុន សែន។ នយោបាយបក្ខពួកនិយមរបស់លោក ហ៊ុន សែន ជាហេតុបណ្តាលឲ្យកើតមានវិសមភាពយ៉ាងខ្លាំងនៃសកម្មភាពសង្គម និងសកម្មភាពនយោបាយនៅក្នុងប្រទេសកម្ពុជា ដែលរារាំងមិនឲ្យយុត្តិធម៌ក្នុងប្រទេសកម្ពុជាកើតមានជារូបរាងឡើង។ យុទ្ធនាការ “ បញ្ចប់និទណ្ឌភាពដើម្បីយុត្តិធម៌នៅកម្ពុជា ” នឹងផ្សាភ្ជាប់ប្រជាពលរដ្ឋខ្មែរ ទាំងក្នុង និងក្រៅប្រទេស ព្រមទាំងសហគមន៍អន្តរជាតិ ទៅនឹងការយល់ដឹងអំពីឃាតកម្មដោយរដ្ឋនៅក្នុងប្រទេសកម្ពុជា ដើម្បីបង្កើតនូវចលនាមួយដែលនឹងស្វែងរក និងជម្រុញឲ្យមានការរួបរួមគ្នាក្នុងការថ្កោលទោសប្រឆាំងនឹងអំពើឃោរឃៅនៃរបបលោក ហ៊ុន សែន និងដើម្បីនាំយកជនល្មើសទាំងឡាយទៅផ្តន្ទាទោស។ យើងទាមទារយុត្តិធម៌តាមរយៈការស៊ើបអង្កេតប្រកបដោយឯករាជ្យលើករណីឃាតកម្មទាំងនេះ។ មិនអាចមានសន្តិភាពពិតប្រាកដឡើយ ទាល់តែយើងរួមគ្នាបញ្ចប់និទណ្ឌភាពទាំងអស់គ្នា។ យុទ្ធនាការបញ្ចប់និទណ្ឌភាពនៅក្នុងប្រទេសកម្ពុជា នឹងចាប់ផ្តើមប្រមូលញត្តិរបស់ប្រជាពលរដ្ឋខ្មែរ និងជនបរទេសដែលគាំទ្រការទាមទារឲ្យបញ្ចប់និទណ្ឌភាពនៅកម្ពុជា ដោយប្រើប្រាស់ការទំនាក់ទំនងតាមប្រព័ន្ធអនឡាញ និងដោយផ្ទាល់ ក្នុងការប្រមូលហត្ថលេខាឲ្យគ្រប់ចំនួន ដើម្បីនាំយកលោក ហ៊ុន​ សែន និងបក្ខពួក ឲ្យទៅប្រឈមនឹងប្រព័ន្ធយុត្តិធម៌នៃតុលាការឯករាជ្យនៅប្រទេសដែលមានយុត្តាធិការសកល ( UNIVERSAL JURISDICTION ) ។ អត្តសញ្ញាណ និងអាសយដ្ឋានរបស់ម្ចាស់ហត្ថលេខានីមួយៗនឹងមិនត្រូវបានលាតត្រដាង​ឡើយ នៅក្នុងនីតិវិធីរបស់តុលាការ។ ហត្ថលេខាទាំងនេះនឹងត្រូវបានបញ្ជូនទៅដោយភ្ជាប់ជាមួយនូវរបាយការណ៍សំណុំរឿងនៃជនរងគ្រោះដែលត្រូវបានសម្លាប់ដោយរបបលោក ហ៊ុន សែន ចាប់តាំងពីការចុះហត្ថលេខាលើកិច្ចព្រមព្រៀងសន្តិភាពទីក្រុងប៉ារីស។ របាយការណ៍សំណុំរឿងនៃជនរងគ្រោះនឹងត្រូវបានចងក្រងជាសៀវភៅស សម្រាប់ធ្វើការផ្សព្វផ្សាយ និងប្រើប្រាស់ជាព័ត៌មានសាធារណៈ ការតស៊ូមតិ និងឧបករណ៍បង្រៀន ដើម្បីលាតត្រដាងការពិតអំពីរឿងរ៉ាវដែលរបបលោក ហ៊ុន សែន បានព្យាយាមបិទបាំង។ យើងអំពាវនាវដល់ប្រទេសហត្ថលេខីទាំងអស់នៃកិច្ចព្រមព្រៀងសន្តិភាពទីក្រុងប៉ារីស ឲ្យចាត់វិធានការជាក់លាក់នានា តាមរយៈការដាក់ទណ្ឌកម្មលើទិដ្ឋាការ និងការបង្កកទ្រព្យសម្បត្តិ ចំពោះលោក ហ៊ុន សែន និងបក្ខពួកនៃរបបរបស់លោក ដើម្បីដាក់សម្ពាធបន្ថែមទៀតលើរបបនេះឲ្យបញ្ឈប់វប្បធម៌និទណ្ឌភាពនៅក្នុងប្រទេសកម្ពុជា និងត្រូវធ្វើការស៊ើបអង្កេតប្រកបដោយឯករាជ្យលើករណីឃាតកម្មទាំងនេះ ដោយមានការចូលរួមពីសហគមន៍អន្តរជាតិ ក្នុងការស្វែងរកយុត្តិធម៌ជូនជនរងគ្រោះទាំងអស់។ EN RAISON DE LA PEUR ET DES POSSIBILITÉS DE RÉPRESSION POLITIQUE , POUR ASSURER LA SÉCURITÉ DES CAMBODGIENS , LA PÉTITION PEUT ÊTRE SIGNÉE DE MANIÈRE ANONYME POUR PROTÉGER VOTRE IDENTITÉ . ENSEMBLE , NOUS LUTTONS POUR METTRE FIN À L'IMPUNITÉ : JUSTICE POUR LES VICTIMES DE MEURTRES SOUTENUS PAR L'ÉTAT AU CAMBODGE PLUS DE QUARANTE ANS SE SONT ÉCOULÉS DEPUIS LA CHUTE DU RÉGIME KHMER ROUGE , MAIS DES EXÉCUTIONS EXTRAJUDICIAIRES N'ONT CESSÉ D'ÊTRE LARGEMENT COMMISES . LE RÉGIME DE HUN SEN AU CAMBODGE UTILISE ENCORE DES MÉTHODES INJUSTES POUR FAIRE TAIRE LES OPPOSANTS POLITIQUES ET LES ADVERSAIRES . AUCUNE ENQUÊTE JUDICIAIRE INDÉPENDANTE POUR CES TUERIES QUI IMPLIQUENT HUN SEN ONT ÉTÉ MENÉES . LA POLITIQUE PARTISANE DE HUN SEN DICTE DE VASTES ACTIONS POLITIQUES ET SOCIALES INÉQUITABLES AU CAMBODGE , EMPÊCHANT LA JUSTICE CAMBODGIENNE DE SE MATÉRIALISER . LA CAMPAGNE DE « METTRE FIN À L'IMPUNITÉ POUR LA JUSTICE AU CAMBODGE » ORGANISERA UNE PÉTITION < < EMMENEZ HUN SEN VERS UN SYSTÈME DE JUSTICE INDÉPENDANT > > À LA FOIS EN LIGNE ET DIRECTEMENT AVEC LES COMMUNAUTÉS CAMBODGIENNES À L'INTÉRIEUR ET À L'EXTÉRIEUR DU PAYS ET POUR LES NON-CAMBODGIENS DANS LE DE GAGNER 500 000 SIGNATURES QUI SERONT ENVOYÉES AVEC LES RAPPORTS DE CAS DE CHAQUE VICTIME ASSASSINÉE PAR LE RÉGIME DE HUN SEN DEPUIS LA SIGNATURE DES ACCORDS DE PAIX DE PARIS . LE RAPPORT DE CAS DE CHAQUE VICTIME SERA CONSIGNÉ DANS UN LIVRE BLANC QUI SERVIRA DE MATÉRIEL D'INFORMATION PUBLIQUE , D'ÉDUCATION , DE PLAIDOYER ET DE RÉVÉLATION DE LA VÉRITÉ QUE LE RÉGIME DE HUN SEN TENTÉ DE CACHER . NOUS DEMANDONS JUSTICE PAR LE BIAIS D'ENQUÊTES INDÉPENDANTES SUR CES HOMICIDES . IL N ' AURA PAS DE PAIX VÉRITABLE TANT QUE NOUS N'AURONS PAS MIS FIN ENSEMBLE À L'IMPUNITÉ . NOUS PLAIDERONS POUR QUE LES SIGNATAIRES DES ACCORDS DE PAIX DE PARIS IMPOSENT DES SANCTIONS DE VISA ET LE GEL DES AVOIRS DE HUN SEN ET DE CEUX DIRECTEMENT IMPLIQUÉS DANS LES EXÉCUTIONS EXTRAJUDICIAIRES . DES CÉRÉMONIES DE COMMÉMORATION AURA LIEU LE 10 JUILLET 2020 DANS LES COMMUNAUTÉS CAMBODGIENNES DU MONDE ENTIER , AUTOUR DU QUATRIÈME ANNIVERSAIRE DE L'ASSASSINAT DE KEM LEY À PHNOM PENH LE 10 JUILLET 2016 . DR. KIM LEY ÉTAIT UN ACTIVISTE , MÉDECIN ET CRITIQUE POLITIQUE CAMBODGIEN , CONNU POUR SES COMMENTAIRES POLITIQUES , EN PARTICULIER SUR LE PARTI DU PEUPLE CAMBODGIEN . TOUT AU LONG DE SA VIE , IL ÉTÉ CHERCHEUR SUR LE VIH ET LE SIDA AUPRÈS DU PNUD , DE L'UNICEF ET DE L'USAID , AINSI QU'UN ÉCRIVAIN POLITIQUE ET ACTIVISTE . SURTOUT , IL ÉTAIT APPRÉCIÉ DE NOMBREUX CAMBODGIENS . DANS UN ASSASSINAT À MOTIVATION POLITIQUE , LEY ÉTÉ TUÉ PAR BALLE LE 10 JUILLET . L ’ ASSASSINAT DE KEM LEY ÉTÉ DÉVASTATEUR POUR LES COMMUNAUTÉS CAMBODGIENNES ET ÉTÉ CONDAMNÉ AUX NIVEAUX NATIONAL ET INTERNATIONAL . LES CÉRÉMONIES DE COMMÉMORATION DU 10 JUILLET MARQUERONT ÉGALEMENT LE LANCEMENT DE « NOUS NE VOUS AVONS JAMAIS OUBLIÉ - METTRE FIN À L'IMPUNITÉ AU CAMBODGE » , UNE CAMPAGNE MONDIALE VISANT À OBTENIR JUSTICE POUR : • PISET PILIKA , DANSEUSE DE BALLET ET ACTRICE DE RENOM ASSASSINÉE LE 6 JUILLET 1999• CHEA VICHEA , LE PREMIER DIRIGEANT SYNDICAL , ASSASSINÉ LE 22 JANVIER 2004• CHUT WUTTY , UN ENVIRONNEMENTALISTE INTRÉPIDE ASSASSINÉ LE 26 AVRIL 2012 NOUS RENDRONS ÉGALEMENT HOMMAGE À L'ESPRIT DES JOURNALISTES , DES MILITANTS , DES MILITAIRES , DES DIRIGEANTS SYNDICAUX , DES POLITICIENS , DES ÉTUDIANTS , DES CITOYENS ET DES TRAVAILLEURS INNOCENTS ASSASSINÉS DEPUIS LA SIGNATURE DES ACCORDS DE PAIX DE PARIS LE 23 OCTOBRE 1991 . ENSEMBLE , NOUS LUTTONS POUR METTRE FIN À L'IMPUNITÉ : LA JUSTICE POUR LES VICTIMES DE MEURTRES SOUTENUS PAR L'ÉTAT AU CAMBODGE ENGAGERA DES CAMBODGIENS ET DES PERSONNALITÉS INTERNATIONALES AYANT CONNAISSANCE DES ASSASSINATS D'ÉTAT AU CAMBODGE POUR FORMER UN MOUVEMENT QUI CHERCHERA À SUSCITER DES CONDAMNATIONS UNIFIÉES CONTRE LA BRUTALITÉ DU RÉGIME DE HUN SEN ET DE TRADUIRE LES PRINCIPAUX COUPABLES EN JUSTICE . NOUS AVONS CHOISI L'ASSASSINAT TRAGIQUE DE DR. KEM LEY COMME L ’ ÉVÉNEMENT PRINCIPAL AFIN QUE LES CAMBODGIENS À L'INTÉRIEUR ET À L'EXTÉRIEUR DU CAMBODGE PUISSENT COMMÉMORER ET EXPRIMER LEUR DEUIL SUR LA CRUAUTÉ COMMISE SOUS LE RÉGIME DICTATORIAL ACTUEL . EN ACCEPTANT D'ÊTRE COMPLAISANTS ENVERS LA FAUSSE DÉMOCRATIE SOUS LE RÉGIME DE HUN SEN , LES SIGNATAIRES DES ACCORDS DE PAIX DE PARIS MANQUENT À LEURS OBLIGATIONS ENVERS LE PEUPLE DU CAMBODGE QUI MÉRITE UNE VRAIE PAIX .

full_content_nostopwords: SCHOOL CANTEEN MUST BECOME FAST FOOD RESTAURANT : LET 'S BLOCK SINGLE PORTIONS PLASTIC PROTECT CHILDREN 'S MEALS SCHOOL ! BASED PRESUMED RISKS VIRAL TRANSMISSION , MINISTRY EDUCATION INDICATES LUNCH BOX SINGLE PORTIONS SOLUTION EATING MEALS CLASS . ONE POSSIBLE SCENARIOS SCHOOL CANTEEN FORESEEN SEPTEMBER : MEALS SEALED PLASTIC PORTIONS SIMPLIFIED FAST FOOD-STYLE MENUS . TRANSLATED : INDUSTRIALLY PREPARED FOOD CENTRALIZED KITCHENS , KEPT WARM OVERCOOK HOURS ( 4 8 ) FINALLY CONVEYED SCHOOLS , EVEN ALREADY EQUIPPED INTERNAL KITCHENS WOULD LONGER USED . QUALITY MEAL WOULD WORSEN `` SIMPLIFICATION MENUS '' , PIANO SCUOLA SAYS , RESULT WHITE TOMATO PASTA , STICKS , HAM PIZZA . SCIENTIFIC REASON JUSTIFIES SINGLE PORTIONS SAY DR. FRANCO BERRINO INTERVIEW SUBJECT . SCIENTIFIC DOCUMENTATION PRODUCED INTERNATIONAL NATIONAL HEALTH INSTITUTIONS SUBJECT COVID CATERING * ALSO STATES APPLICATION STRENGTHENING GOOD HYGIENIC PRACTICES SUFFICIENT HANDLING FOOD . CONTRARY , SINGLE PORTIONS RISK HARMFUL SOLUTION HEALTH CHILDREN : SCIENTIFIC EVIDENCE INDICATES , PROCESSED FOOD , DEPLETED NUTRITIONAL PROTECTIVE VALUES , CAUSE CHRONIC-DEGENERATIVE PATHOLOGIES . SIMPLIFIED MENUS , UNBALANCED DISTANT MEDITERRANEAN DIET TERMS VARIETY NUTRITIONAL QUALITY AMONG MAIN CAUSES OBESITY . WOULD EVEN GREATER IMPACT CHILDREN LIVE CONDITIONS ABSOLUTE POVERTY ( ONE MILLION ) SCHOOL MEAL REPRESENTS OPPORTUNITY EAT PROPERLY . PANDEMIC ALBI RATES INCREASE ACCORDING MARKET OPERATORS , MEAL SYSTEM EXPENSIVE , POINT REQUIRING REVISION CONTRACTS WOULD ADD NEW COSTS , PURCHASE DISPOSABLE TABLEWARE THERMOSEALERS HIGHER CLEANING COSTS . ADDITION DAMAGE PUFF ! MORE' FOOD REJECTED THROWN AWAY OVERCOOKED LESS TASTY WOULD INCREASE ( TODAY ALREADY 30 % ) . LOSS ( FEMALE ) JOBS EXPECTED : MEAL SERVICE WORKERS SCHOOLS COMPANIES WOULD BECOME SUPERFLUOUS . ENVIRONMENTAL IMPACT WOULD ENORMOUS : 11 KG PLASTIC WASTE PER CHILD WOULD PRODUCED SCHOOL YEAR ! N'T SUPPOSED ABANDON DISPOSABLE PLASTIC ? ? SOLUTION ! TACKLING COVID PANDEMIC FOCUSING HEALTH ENVIRONMENTAL EDUCATION NEW GENERATIONS . HEALTHY GOOD DIET ESSENTIAL PREVENTION . LAST MARCH , MINISTRY ENVIRONMENT LAUNCHED NEW MINIMUM ENVIRONMENTAL CRITERIA ( CAM ) PUBLIC CATERING ( INCLUDING SCHOOL CANTEENS ) INCLUDE SALIENT POINTS : - GREATER SHARE ORGANIC FOODS ( 40 50 % ) - GREATER PRESENCE SHORT CHAIN/ZERO KM FOODS - CLEAR REDUCTION WASTE WASTE USE DISPOSABLE PRODUCTS FULL COMPLIANCE HYGIENE MEASURES , POSSIBLE ADMINISTER MEAL CLASS WITHOUT EXPIRING SINGLE PORTIONS APPLYING CAMS USING THERMAL TROLLEYS . PERSONNEL INVOLVED BOWLING , SUITABLY TRAINED EQUIPPED GLOVES MASKS , WOULD ELIMINATED , WOULD CONTINUE SERVE MEALS CHILDREN CLASS SAFETY . USE SINGLE PORTIONS WOULD EXCEPTION NEW CAMS MADE LAW ! ASK MINISTRY EDUCATION ENVIRONMENT ADOPT LUNCH BOX SOLUTION SINGLE PORTIONS , SIMPLIFY MEAL DEVIATE NEW CAMS . PRIME MINISTERREPUBLIC INDIASOUTH BLOCKNEW DELHI DEAR PRIME MINISTER , RECENT PRONOUNCEMENTS GOVERNMENT RELATING HIGHER EDUCATION REVEAL INTENTION SLASH PUBLIC-FUNDING THEREBY PAVING WAY PRIVATIZATION COMMERCIALIZATION EDUCATION COUNTRY . MOVES LIKE 70:30 FUNDING FORMULA ( WHEREBY INSTITUTIONS EXPECTED GENERATE LEAST 30 % ADDITIONAL EXPENSES REVISION SALARIES DUE 7TH PAY REVISION ) , SHIFT GRANTS LOAN-BASED FUNDING INFRASTRUCTURE EXPANSION HIGHER EDUCATION FUNDING AGENCY PUSH INTRODUCE SELF-FINANCING COURSES AUTONOMOUS COLLEGE SCHEME , FORCING UNIVERSITIES GRADED AUTONOMY WHEREBY FREEDOM INVITE FOREIGN FACULTY INTRODUCE MARKET-FRIENDLY COURSES BOUND ESCALATING EFFECT COST EDUCATION BRING QUALITY . SLASH PUBLIC EXPENDITURE HIGHER EDUCATION EVIDENT ACROSS SPECTRUM IITS , IIMS , NITS , CENTRAL STATE UNIVERSITIES . CSIR ALREADY ASKED RESEARCH LABS GENERATE RESOURCES . UNDOUBTEDLY , BENEFICIAL FUTURE SCIENCE RESEARCH COUNTRY . CUTS RESEARCH GRANTS SEATS ADVERSE IMPACT RESEARCH DEVELOPMENT INITIATIVES UNIVERSITIES . CENTRAL ASSISTANCE STATE UNIVERSITIES TOWARDS IMPLEMENTATION 7 PAY REVISION DRASTICALLY REDUCED 80 % 5 YEARS 50 % 39 MONTHS . SHOCKING GOVERNMENT GONE AHEAD PLANS DESPITE OPPOSITION EXPRESSED TEACHERS ’ ASSOCIATIONS . 6 BILLS RELATING HIGHER EDUCATION COULD PASSED PARLIAMENT BROUGHT WITHOUT DISCUSSION CONSULTATION . SIMILARLY , GOVERNMENT FELT NEED INVITE CONSULTATIONS CROSS-SECTION TEACHERS ’ STUDENTS ’ BODIES UNIVERSITIES CITIZENS DRAFT NEW EDUCATION POLICY BRINGING PIECE-MEAL REGULATIONS . SIDE LINING HIGHEST EXECUTIVE BODY AUGUR WELL FUTURE COUNTRY . ACCESS GOOD-QUALITY HIGHER EDUCATION CRUCIAL PRECONDITION POSITIVE SOCIAL CHANGE INCLUSIVE DEVELOPMENT DEVELOPING NATION LIKE INDIA . GOVERNMENT PROMOTES PRIVATISATION COMMERCIALISATION HIGHER EDUCATION , TURNING BLIND EYE ENORMOUS ASPIRATION COMMON POOR PEOPLE ACCESS HIGHER EDUCATION . RISING COST HIGHER EDUCATION ENDANGER PROSPECTS WOMEN , SOCIALLY ECONOMICALLY MARGINALISED SECTIONS DIFFERENTLY-ABLED STUDENTS . SECTIONS CONSTITUTE SIGNIFICANT PORTION INDIA 'S PREDOMINANTLY YOUNG POPULATION . INTERESTS SECURED , GOVERNMENT 'S DREAM DEMOGRAPHIC DIVIDEND REMAIN UNREALISED . 7TH PAY REVISION TEACHERS ENDED PARITY TEACHERS INDIA SERVICES , DEMAND RECOGNISED SEVERAL PAY COMMISSIONS MEANS ATTRACT TALENT TEACHING PROFESSION . TEACHERS ENTER PROFESSION HIGHER QUALIFICATIONS LATER AGE HENCE , MUST GIVEN HIGHER STARTING PAY . WITHDRAWAL INCREMENTS PHD/ MPHIL DISINCENTIVISE RESEARCH . SEVERAL CONDITIONS RELATING SERVICE CONDITIONS LIKE INSISTENCE MINIMUM NUMBER HOURS TEACHING PRESENCE INSTITUTION WITHOUT NECESSARY INFRASTRUCTURE ENGAGE ACADEMIC WORK DEMOTIVATE TEACHERS . UNIVERSITIES , EVEN PRESTIGIOUS CENTRAL UNIVERSITIES LIKE DELHI UNIVERSITY , FAILED FILL VACANCIES PERMANENT FACULTY . MAJORITY TEACHERS WORKING LONG YEARS GUEST , TEMPORARY AD-HOC BASIS DESPITE REQUIRED QUALIFICATIONS . BEST MINDS SEEKING JOBS ABROAD PRIVATE-SECTOR UNIVERSITIES . TEACHERS NEED REGULARISED PERMANENT JOBS ABLE CONTRIBUTE INTELLECTUAL CULTURAL GROWTH RESPECTIVE INSTITUTIONS . GOVERNMENT IMPORTANT RESPONSIBILITY MAINTAINING STANDARDS EDUCATION , TRAMPLE UPON ACADEMIC FREEDOM FREEDOM DISCUSS DEBATE DIVERSE IDEAS . UGC CURRENTLY IMPOSED CHOICE-BASED UNDERGRADUATE CURRICULUM ( CBCS ) REFUSES SANCTION ADEQUATE TEACHING POSITIONS ALLOW UNIVERSITIES COLLEGES OFFER ENOUGH CHOICES . HENCE , CHOICES REMAIN PAPER NEVER IMPLEMENTED PRACTICE . STUDENTS TEACHERS CURRENTLY STATE TREMENDOUS ANXIETY UNREST POLICY ENVIRONMENT HIGHER EDUCATION HOSTILE IN-DEPTH TEACHING-LEARNING . بعمليات فساد كبيرة مما يودي الى حالة هيجان للمستخدمين في العراق حيث قامت الشركات مؤخراً بفصل خدمة الانترنيت لأيام عديدة وتقليل سرعة الاتصال الى اقل من 1 ميغابت يرجع السبب الى عدة تصريحات ف الشركات المجهزة للانترنيت في العراق ذكرت بان المشكلة حاصلة في قطع الكابل البحري وعند مناشدة وزارة الاتصالات يصرح المسوول الرسمي لها بان وزارة الاتصالات لا تعاني من اي مشاكل في بطئ الانترنيت والقطع الحاصل هو بسبب فساد الشركات المجهزة للانترنيت اي كيو نيتورك و سكوب سكاي ... ولا احد يستطيع محاسبتهم في العراق بسبب نفوذهم القوي في العراق من قبل باقي الشركات الداعمة لهم بسحب الخدمة وتوزيعها على المستخدمين مثل ايرثلنك و نوروز و الجزيرة وباقي الشركات التي تذم بعضها على سوء الخدمات والمستخدم هو الشخص الضعيف المتورط في هذه الشركات الطاغية التي لا نستطيع ايصال صوتنا اليهم بسبب الضغوطات من قبل الموظفين والنفوذ المسؤوليين , نحن نواجه هذه المشاكل لسنين وكل ما نطلبه هو خدمة انترنت جيدة مع اسعار معقولة لأننا نستحق ما ندفع لأجله . كما أعلنت الشركة الوطنية الممثلة بالشركة العامة للاتصالات ان إيراداتها من الانترنت يبلغ ( 150 ) مليون دولار سنويا مقابل حصولها على ( 10 لامدا ) فقط ، على الرغم من انها متعاقدة مع خمس شركات موردة للانترنت في العراق تصل سعاتها مجتمعة الى ( 90 لامدا ) أي ما يعادل ( 900 غيغابايت ) . مما يعني بأن هناك حوالي 80 لامدا تُهرب بدون تسجيل، وتستورد من دول الجوار بدون علم الحكومة العراقية، وتدفع اجورهن من قبل خمس شركات رئيسية وهي ( سكوب سكاي ‐ اي كيو – ونوروزتل ‐ ايرثلنك ‐ سرد ) . اذا ما افترضنا ان إيرادات الدولة ستكون 150 مليون دولار سنويا لقاء الـ ( 10 لامدا ) ، فهذا يعني ان ( 80 لامدا ) المهربة تؤتي إيرادات للدولة تصل الى 1.2 مليار دولار سنويا . أي يتم سرقة الدولة العراقية حوالي مليار وربع دولار سنويا من قبل هذه الشركات في ظل سكوت هيئة الاعلام والاتصالات وحماية واسناد ودعم وزارة الاتصالات . في تموز الماضي توجهت وزارة الاتصالات لتمييع هذه السرقة من خلال مشروع يحمل الاسم ( سمفوني ) وتحويل الكابلات من غير شرعية الى شرعية وتحويل الباندات ( الحزم ) للمشروع الجديد، واعطتها الشرعية تحت مسمى المشروع الوطني للانترنت، وهو تحايل وفساد واضح، اذ ستكون حصة الحكومة من هذا المليار وربع نحو 200 مليون فقط في احسن الأحوال . ولا يخفى ان مشروع مد الكابلات الضوئية هو مشروع متلكئ، ومُنح قسم منه لاصحاب الأبراج، الذين مدوا الكابلات بطريقة عشوائية وخارج الضوابط، وبعيدا عن التنسيق مع الدوائر الخدمية والبلدية . والان المستخدم العراقي يعاني من مشاكل كبيرة في الانترنيت بسبب الصراعات السياسية و التجارية بين الشركات وهذه دليل بسيط لقياس السرعات الحقيقية لكل الشركات المتورطة المصادر التي تقوم بتزويد العراق بالانترنت هي : 1- شركة اي كيو نيتورك | HTTPS : //BGP.HE.NET/AS442172- شركة سكوب سكاي | HTTPS : //BGP.HE.NET/AS50597 مطالبنة من خلال هذه الحملة هي بسيطة ومن حق اي مواطن : استرجاع جميع اموال المستخدمين الذين دفعوا مالهم ولم يستلموا كمقابل خدمة الانترنيت بصورة طبيعية .. او تعويضهم من خلال فترات مجانية مقابلة كتعويض بسيط من قبل الشركة المجهزةإصلاح المشاكل الحاصلة في شركات الانترنيت و إرجاع الخدمة الى صورتها الطبيعية عن طريق لجنة تحقيقية لمكافحة الفاسدين من اجل تطوير الخدمة وكشف التواطئ السياسي والجشع الحكومي في وزارة الأتصالات وهيئة الإعلام والأتصالات مع الشركات المجهزة والمصدرة لخدمة الأنترنيت.في حال لم تستطع الشركات الحالية اثبات كفائتها واستمرت في عملياته الملتوية لسرقة حقوق المستخدمين يتم دعوة الشركات العملاقة في الدول المجاورة لتقديم عروضها في معالجة الازمة الحاصلة في العراق مثل شركة TTNET التي تغطي خدماتها اكثر من 90 مليون مستخدم في دول المجاورةمن اكبر شركات تزويد الانترنيت في العراق هي شركة ايرثلنك للاتصالات وسيتم ذكر تفاصيل والمعانات الجارية FIVE THOUSAND MILES WEST LOS ANGELES 500 MILES NORTH EQUATOR LIES SMALL ISLAND CHAIN KNOWN MARSHALL ISLANDS . MANY US , ISLANDS BEST KNOWN BIRTHPLACE MOVIE MONSTER `` GODZILLA , '' AWAKENED MUTATED ATOMIC BOMB EXPLOSIONS ONE MANY ISLANDS . SADLY , ISLANDS MAY NEVER ACTUALLY END SPAWNING TERRIFYING LIZARD BREATHES RADIOACTIVE FIRE . MAY STILL FRIGHTENING REAL WORLD , EVEN , SOON . MARSHALL ISLANDS REMNANTS ANCIENT VOLCANOES PROTRUDED REGION FIRST SETTLED NEARLY 3,000 YEARS AGO ANCESTORS PRESENT-DAY MARSHALLESE . PEOPLE CROSSED OCEAN BOAT ASIA POLYNESIA . LIVED LARGELY SECLUDED PEACEFUL EXISTENCE MID-1940S . WORLD WAR II , JAPANESE RULED ISLANDS UNITED STATES SHOWED TOOK 1944 . QUICKLY , AMERICAN PRESENCE ISLANDS DRAMATICALLY INCREASED . AMERICAN OFFICIALS EAGER FIND LOCATION TEST GROWING ATOMIC ARSENAL COLD WAR BEGAN . VAST EMPTY EXPANSIVE OCEAN REGION NEARLY FIVE TIMES SIZE CALIFORNIA SEEMED IDEAL SPOT . FACT , 1946 1958 , UNITED STATES DETONATED TOTAL 67 NUCLEAR DEVICES ACROSS ISLANDS , LEAVING SORTS HAZARDOUS , RADIOACTIVE WASTE BEHIND . ISLANDS EVEN HOME BIGGEST THERMONUCLEAR BOMB EVER TESTED UNITED STATES GOVERNMENT CALLED `` CASTLE BRAVO . '' EXPERIMENTAL NUCLEAR DEVICE CREATED MUSHROOM CLOUD 4 ½ MILES TALL . TODAY , BOMB RANKS THIRD LARGEST ARTIFICIAL EXPLOSION , EQUIVALENT 15 MEGATONS TNT , MAKING 1,000 TIMES POWERFUL LITTLE BOY BOMB U.S . DROPPED HIROSHIMA . EXPLOSION , DROPPED RADIOACTIVE ASH ACROSS 7,000 SQUARE MILES SURROUNDING AREA AROUND MARSHALL ISLANDS . MARSHALLESE EVACUATED ISLANDS THREE DAYS BOMB 'S DETONATION . MANY WOULD SUFFER ACUTE RADIATION SICKNESS . HEAVY FALLOUT ALSO CONTAMINATED TWENTY-THREE ADDITIONAL MEMBERS NEARBY JAPANESE FISHING VESSEL . INITIAL BLAST VAPORIZED ISLAND BOMB WENT CREATED CRATER 2,000 METERS WIDE 76 METERS DEEP . LAST NUCLEAR BOMB UNITED STATES DETONATED ISLANDS 1958 . SHORTLY AFTERWARD , WORLD BEGAN UNDERSTANDING IMPLICATIONS SUSTAINED ABOVE-GROUND ATOMIC TESTING . 1963 , TREATY SIGNED AMONGST WORLD 'S NATIONS BANNED NUCLEAR WEAPONS TESTING ATMOSPHERE , OUTER SPACE , UNDERWATER , STILL STANDS TODAY . HOWEVER , FAR MARSHALL ISLANDS CONCERNED , U.S. ALREADY DONE DAMAGE . NUCLEAR TESTING CAME ANOTHER HORRIBLE LONG-TERM PRICE . 'S ALSO LEFT BEHIND INCREDIBLE AMOUNT HAZARDOUS , RADIOACTIVE WASTE . UNITED STATES GOVERNMENT KNEW SOMETHING CLEAN MESS . RESULT , BUILT GIANT TOMB STORE RADIOACTIVE DEBRIS 1970S . BUILT ONE ISOLATED ISLANDS CHAIN CALLED RUNIT . TOMB BUILT ENORMOUS EXISTING CRATER PREVIOUS NUCLEAR TEST KEPT MASSIVE CONCRETE DOME SEAL HARMFUL CONTENTS FOREVER . DOME 115 METERS WIDE 18 INCHES THICK . TODAY , TOMB CONTAINS 3.1 MILLION CUBIC FEET 35 OLYMPIC-SIZED SWIMMING POOLS NUCLEAR WASTE . HOWEVER , N'T INCLUDE NUCLEAR WASTE AMERICA GENERATED MARSHALL ISLANDS . U.S. GOVERNMENT ALSO SENT 130 TONS RADIOACTIVE SOIL ATOMIC DEBRIS NUCLEAR TEST SITES NEVADA THREW TOMB JOIN MARSHALL ISLAND DEBRIS . TOMB RUNIT ISLAND BECAME ONE AMERICA 'S LARGEST STORAGE SITES NUCLEAR WASTE . 'S LOCATED 7,000 MILES WASHINGTON , DC , 'S 665 MILES MARSHALL ISLANDS ' CAPITAL CITY , MAJURO . TOMB 'S CONSTRUCTION EFFORT TOOK THREE YEARS COMPLETE HELP 4,000 U.S. SERVICE MEMBERS . SIX MEN DIED ACUTE RADIATION POISONING CONSTRUCTION , HUNDREDS DEVELOPED RADIATION-LINKED CANCERS HANDLING HAZARDOUS WASTES . DANGEROUS WASTE INCLUDES SORTS RADIATED EQUIPMENT , SOIL , PLUTONIUM LEASE CHUNKS CONCRETE METAL . ONE PARTICULAR ISOTOPE PLUTONIUM HOUSED INSIDE TOMB , PLUTONIUM-239 , HALF-LIFE 24,100 YEARS , MEANS TAKE 24,100 YEARS MATERIAL LOSE HALF RADIOACTIVITY . HOWEVER , 'S EVEN WORSE CONSTRUCTION , GOVERNMENT FAILED BUILD CONCRETE LINING UNDERNEATH DOME INSTEAD RELIED UPON EXISTING CRATER . RESULT , SEAWATER SLOWLY BEGUN SEEPING TOMB PACIFIC OCEAN SURROUNDING . SEEPS , 'LL LEAK TAKE RADIOACTIVE WASTE PACIFIC . , MARSHALLESE MAINTAIN DECADES-OLD DECAYING STRUCTURE WORRYING FUTURE PRISTINE PLACE . 'S EVEN ALARMING REMEMBER WORLD 'S CLIMATE CHANGING RAPIDLY , OCEAN SEA LEVELS RISING . MARSHALL ISLANDS , PARTICULAR , FACE GRAVER THREAT PLACES . FACT , SINCE 1993 , SEA LEVELS WITHIN MARSHALL ISLANDS REGION RISEN 0.3 INCHES PER YEAR . BASED FORECASTED SEA LEVELS , COULD REACH 4 5 ADDITIONAL FEET END CENTURY ALONE . 'S WITHIN LIFETIMES WOULD EFFECTIVELY SUBMERGE ISLANDS GOOD TOMB . POTENTIALLY EVEN COLLAPSING DOME RELEASING INCREDIBLE AMOUNT RADIOACTIVE WASTE INSIDE . SINCE TOMB ALREADY SOMEWHAT BOBBING TIDES TODAY , COULD PRESENT COMPLETE DISASTER SCENARIO . TODAY , THOUSANDS DEAD FISH WASHING SHORE REGULARLY DUE TERRIBLE RADIOACTIVE WASTE ALREADY LEAKING SURROUNDING WATER . REPORT , DETERMINED 'S IMMEDIATE DANGER COLLAPSE FAILURE . EVEN , REMAINS SEEN CONTINUE TRUE NEXT DECADES , PARTICULARLY SEA LEVELS RISE ENOUGH SUBMERGE DOME . FAR MARSHALLESE CONCERNED , HOWEVER , MUCH MARSHALL ISLANDS ALREADY UNINHABITABLE DUE REGION 'S SIZEABLE RADIOACTIVE HAZARD . REPORTED ISLANDS EVEN RADIOACTIVE CHERNOBYL . BRITAIN , LATE 18 TH CENTURY , MOVEMENT ABOLITION SLAVERY , 300 THOUSAND PEOPLE BOYCOTTED SUGAR PRODUCED SLAVES PLANTATIONS . MOVEMENT ABOLITION MEAT EXPRESSES POLITICAL APPROACH : PURPOSE BRING PUBLIC SUBSCRIBE IDEA MEAT BANNED . GOAL HUMAN SOCIETIES , ONE , DECIDE BAN PRODUCTION , SALE CONSUMPTION MEAT . IDEA CLAIM LOUD CLEAR RESPONSIBILITY INDIVIDUAL STOP SUPPORTING MURDEROUS EXPLOITATION REQUESTED CONSUMPTION ANIMAL BODIES `` ANIMAL DERIVATIVES '' , ALSO , THEREFORE , DUTY SOCIETY WHOLE DECLARE FAVOR BAN REARING , FISHING HUNTING . DICHIARAZIONE UNIVERSALE DEI DIRITTI DELL'ANIMALE UNIVERSAL DECLARATION ANIMAL RIGHTS PREAMBLE : CONSIDERING LIFE ONE , LIVING BEINGS COMMON ORIGIN DIVERSIFIED COURSE EVOLUTION SPECIES , - CONSIDERING LIVING BEINGS POSSESS NATURAL RIGHTS , ANIMAL NERVOUS SYSTEM SPECIFIC RIGHTS , CONSIDERING CONTEMPT , EVEN SIMPLE IGNORANCE , NATURAL RIGHTS , CAUSE SERIOUS DAMAGE NATURE LEAD MEN COMMIT CRIMES ANIMALS , CONSIDERING COEXISTENCE SPECIES IMPLIES RECOGNITION HUMAN SPECIES RIGHT ANIMAL SPECIES LIVE , CONSIDERING RESPECT ANIMALS HUMANS INSEPARABLE RESPECT MEN , HEREBY PROCLAIMED : ARTICLE 1 ANIMALS EQUAL RIGHTS EXIST WITHIN CONTEXT BIOLOGICAL EQUILIBRIUM . EQUALITY RIGHTS OVERSHADOW DIVERSITY SPECIES INDIVIDUALS . ARTICLE 2 ANIMAL LIFE RIGHT RESPECTED . ARTICLE 3 1°- ANIMALS MUST SUBJECTED BAD TREATMENTS CRUEL ACTS . 2°- NECESSARY KILL ANIMAL , MUST INSTANTANEOUS , PAINLESS CAUSE APPREHENSION . 3°- DEAD ANIMAL MUST TREATED DECENCY . ARTICLE 4 1°- WILD ANIMALS RIGHT LIVE REPRODUCE FREEDOM NATURAL ENVIRONMENT . 2°- PROLONGED DEPRIVATION FREEDOM WILD ANIMALS , HUNTING FISHING PRACTISED PASTIME , WELL USE WILD ANIMALS REASONS VITAL , CONTRARY FUNDAMENTAL RIGHT . ARTICLE 5 1°- ANIMAL DEPENDENT MAN RIGHT PROPER SUSTENANCE CARE . 2°- MUST CIRCUMSTANCES ABANDONED KILLED UNJUSTIFIABLY . 3°- FORMS BREEDING USES ANIMAL MUST RESPECT PHYSIOLOGY BEHAVIOUR SPECIFIC SPECIES . 4°- EXHIBITIONS , SHOWS FILMS INVOLVING ANIMALS MUST ALSO RESPECT DIGNITY MUST INCLUDE VIOLENCE WHATSOEVER . ARTICLE 6 1°- EXPERIMENTS ANIMALS ENTAILING PHYSICAL PSYCHOLOGICAL SUFFERING VIOLATE RIGHTS ANIMALS . 2°-REPLACEMENT METHODS MUST DEVELOPED SYSTEMATICALLY IMPLEMENTED . ARTICLE 7 ACT UNNECESSARY INVOLVING DEATH ANIMAL , DECISION LEADING ACT , CONSTITUTE CRIME LIFE . ARTICLE 8 1°- ACT COMPROMISING SURVIVAL WILD SPECIES DECISION LEADING ACT TANTAMOUNT GENOCIDE , SAY , CRIME SPECIES . 2°- MASSACRE WILD ANIMALS , POLLUTION DESTRUCTION BIOTOPES ACTS GENOCIDE . ARTICLE 9 1°- SPECIFIC LEGAL STATUS ANIMALS RIGHTS MUST RECOGNISED LAW . 2°- PROTECTION SAFETY ANIMALS MUST REPRESENTED LEVEL GOVERNMENTAL ORGANIZATIONS . ARTICLE 10 EDUCATIONAL SCHOOLING AUTHORITIES MUST ENSURE CITIZENS LEARN CHILDHOOD OBSERVE , UNDERSTAND RESPECT ANIMALS . UNIVERSAL DECLARATION ANIMAL RIGHTS SOLEMNLY PROCLAIMED PARIS 15 OCTOBER 1978 UNESCO HEADQUARTERS . PREMESSA CONSIDERATO CHE OGNI ANIMALE HA DEI DIRITTI ; CONSIDERATO CHE IL DISCONOSCIMENTO E IL DISPREZZO DI QUESTI DIRITTI HANNO PORTATO E CONTINUANO PORTARE L ' UOMO COMMETTERE CRIMINI CONTRO LA NATURA E CONTRO GLI ANIMALI ; CONSIDERATO CHE IL RICONOSCIMENTO DA PARTE DELLA SPECIE UMANA DEL DIRITTO ALL'ESISTENZA DELLE ALTRE SPECIE ANIMALI COSTITUISCE IL FONDAMENTO DELLA COESISTENZA DELLE SPECIE NEL MONDO ; CONSIDERATO CHE GENOCIDI SONO PERPETRATI DALL ' UOMO E ALTRI ANCORA SE NE MINACCIANO ; CONSIDERATO CHE IL RISPETTO DEGLI ANIMALI DA PARTE DEGLI UOMINI È LEGATO AL RISPETTO DEGLI UOMINI TRA LORO ; CONSIDERATO CHE L'EDUCAZIONE DEVE INSEGNARE SIN DALL'INFANZIA OSSERVARE , COMPRENDERE , RISPETTARE E AMARE GLI ANIMALI . SI PROCLAMA : ARTICOLO 1 TUTTI GLI ANIMALI NASCONO UGUALI DAVANTI ALLA VITA E HANNO GLI STESSI DIRITTI ALL'ESISTENZA . ARTICOLO 2 ) OGNI ANIMALE HA DIRITTO AL RISPETTO ; B ) L'UOMO , QUANTO SPECIE ANIMALE , NON PUÒ ATTRIBUIRSI IL DIRITTO DI STERMINARE GLI ALTRI ANIMALI DI SFRUTTARLI VIOLANDO QUESTO DIRITTO . EGLI HA IL DOVERE DI METTERE LE SUE CONOSCENZE AL SERVIZIO DEGLI ANIMALI ; C ) OGNI ANIMALE HA DIRITTO ALLA CONSIDERAZIONE , ALLE CURE E ALLA PROTEZIONE DELL'UOMO . ARTICOLO 3 ) NESSUN ANIMALE DOVRÀ ESSERE SOTTOPOSTO MALTRATTAMENTI E AD ATTI CRUDELI ; B ) SE LA SOPPRESSIONE DI UN ANIMALE È NECESSARIA , DEVE ESSERE ISTANTANEA , SENZA DOLORE , NÈ ANGOSCIA . ARTICOLO 4 ) OGNI ANIMALE CHE APPARTIENE UNA SPECIE SELVAGGIA HA IL DIRITTO DI VIVERE LIBERO NEL SUO AMBIENTE NATURALE TERRESTRE , AEREO ACQUATICO E HA IL DIRITTO DI RIPRODURSI ; B ) OGNI PRIVAZIONE DI LIBERTÀ , ANCHE SE FINI EDUCATIVI , È CONTRARIA QUESTO DIRITTO . ARTICOLO 5 ) OGNI ANIMALE APPARTENENTE AD UNA SPECIE CHE VIVE ABITUALMENTE NELL'AMBIENTE DELL ' UOMO HA DIRITTO DI VIVERE E DI CRESCERE SECONDO IL RITMO E NELLE CONDIZIONI DI VITA E DI LIBERTÀ CHE SONO PROPRIE DELLA SUA SPECIE ; B ) OGNI MODIFICA DI QUESTO RITMO E DI QUESTE CONDIZIONI IMPOSTA DALL'UOMO FINI MERCANTILI È CONTRARIA QUESTO DIRITTO . ARTICOLO 6A ) OGNI ANIMALE CHE L'UOMO HA SCELTO PER COMPAGNO HA DIRITTO AD UNA DURATA DELLA VITA CONFORME ALLA SUA NATURALE LONGEVITA ' ; B ) L'ABBANDONO DI UN ANIMALE È UN ATTO CRUDELE E DEGRADANTE . ARTICOLO 7OGNI ANIMALE CHE LAVORA HA DIRITTO RAGIONEVOLI LIMITAZIONI DI DURATA E INTENSITÀ DI LAVORO , AD UN'ALIMENTAZIONE ADEGUATA E AL RIPOSO . ARTICOLO 8A ) LA SPERIMENTAZIONE ANIMALE CHE IMPLICA UNA SOFFERENZA FISICA PSICHICA È INCOMPATIBILE CON DIRITTI DELL ' ANIMALE SIA CHE SI TRATTI DI UNA SPERIMENTAZIONE MEDICA , SCIENTIFICA , COMMERCIALE , SIA DI OGNI ALTRA FORMA DI SPERIMENTAZIONE ; B ) LE TECNICHE SOSTITUTIVE DEVONO ESSERE UTILIZZATE E SVILUPPATE . ARTICOLO 9NEL CASO CHE L'ANIMALE SIA ALLEVATO PER L'ALIMENTAZIONE DEVE ESSERE NUTRITO , ALLOGGIATO , TRASPORTATO E UCCISO SENZA CHE PER LUI NE RISULTI ANSIETÀ ' E DOLORE . ARTICOLO 10A ) NESSUN ANIMALE DEVE ESSERE USATO PER IL DIVERTIMENTO DELL ' UOMO ; B ) LE ESIBIZIONI DI ANIMALI E GLI SPETTACOLI CHE UTILIZZANO DEGLI ANIMALI SONO INCOMPATIBILI CON LA DIGNITÀ DELL'ANIMALE . ARTICOLO 11OGNI ATTO CHE COMPORTI L'UCCISIONE DI UN ANIMALE SENZA NECESSITÀ È UN BIOCIDIO , CIOÈ UN DELITTO CONTRO LA VITA . ARTICOLO 12 OGNI ATTO CHE COMPORTI L'UCCISIONE DI UN GRAN NUMERO DI ANIMALI SELVAGGI È UN GENOCIDIO , CIOÈ UN DELITTO CONTRO LA SPECIE ; B ) L'INQUINAMENTO E LA DISTRUZIONE DELL'AMBIENTE NATURALE PORTANO AL GENOCIDIO . ARTICOLO 13A ) L'ANIMALE MORTO DEVE ESSERE TRATTATO CON RISPETTO ; B ) LE SCENE DI VIOLENZA DI CUI GLI ANIMALI SONO VITTIME DEVONO ESSERE PROIBITE AL CINEMA E ALLA TELEVISIONE MENO CHE NON ABBIANO COME FINE DI MOSTRARE UN ATTENTATO AI DIRITTI DELL'ANIMALE . ARTICOLO 14A ) LE ASSOCIAZIONI DI PROTEZIONE E DI SALVAGUARDIA DEGLI ANIMALI DEVONO ESSERE RAPPRESENTATE LIVELLO GOVERNATIVO ; B ) DIRITTI DELL ' ANIMALE DEVONO ESSERE DIFESI DALLA LEGGE COME DIRITTI DELL'UOMO . DISTRICT STAND SOLIDARITY BIPOC , RELEASING STATEMENTS ACKNOWLEDGMENT SUPPORT AFFECTED COMMUNITIES PUBLIC INCIDENCES RACIAL INJUSTICE OCCUR . FURTHERMORE , DISTRICT MUST TAKE PREVENTATIVE STANCE OVERT COVERT RACISM WITHIN YORKTOWN COMMUNITY . 4 . DIVERSIFY TEACHING ADMINISTRATIVE FACULTY . DISTRICT SPECIFICALLY AIM HIRE BIPOC TEACHERS ADMINISTRATORS . DISTRICT MUST MAKE PUBLIC COMMITMENT IMPROVE MINORITY REPRESENTATION , DEMOGRAPHIC DATA FACULTY COMPOSITION MADE AVAILABLE YORKTOWN COMMUNITY ANNUAL BASIS . 5 . MANDATE EXTENSIVE DIVERSITY , INCLUSION , SENSITIVITY UNCONSCIOUS BIAS TRAINING FACULTY STAFF . TRAINING INCLUDE TOPICS RACE MINORITY EMPOWERMENT ADMINISTERED REPUTABLE , VETTED ORGANIZATIONS . LET KNOW QUEST TITLE COMPANY GRANTS , NM TOLD US MONTHS PAYMENT TRANSFERS CLEARING ACCOUNT CURRENT SANTA RITA OWNERS RESPOND . EMAILS MEMBER GROUP SANTA RITA ALSO STATED GROUP `` WATCHING BINOCULARS '' . CAME $ 4,500 RESULT FRIENDS EXTENDED FAMILY CATRON CIBOLA COUNTY CHOSE REMAIN PROPERTY DEEP LOVE LAND . PEOPLE GROUP SANTA RITA DRIVEN PRIVATE ROADS DARK , DRIVEN DRIVEWAYS , STOLEN MEMORY CARDS BATTERIES GAME CAMERAS WELL GAME CAMERAS PROPERTY GONE WAY HARASS TRY INTIMIDATE FRIENDS . CIBOLA COUNTY OFFICERS NEVER CAME LOOK EVIDENCE ROBBERY `` CAB NOTES '' FILED COPY POSSESSION PROOF INCIDENT TREATED WITHIN SUBDIVISION COUNTY . ASSOCIATES SANTA RITA GONE DANIEL 'S JOB MADE COMPLAINTS WORK VALID COMPLAINTS MADE ATTEMPT HARASS WORKPLACE WITNESSED MANAGEMENT . EMAIL , LET QUEST TITLE KNOW WOULD CAUGHT PAYMENTS , PAST CURRENTLY DUE , COME AUGUST 18TH . title_cleaned_nostopwords: DEMAND HK GOV SUBMIT HR REPORT , URGE UN REVIEW HK 'S SITUATION
description_nostopwords: SUBMIT HUMAN RIGHTS REPORT SUBMISSION URGE UNITED NATIONS LOOK DECLINE HUMAN RIGHTS CITY SIGNATORIES INTERNATIONAL COVENANT CIVIL POLITICAL RIGHTS RESPONSIBILITY TAKE MEASURES ENSURE PROTECTION BASIC CIVIL POLITICAL RIGHTS HUMAN RIGHTS COMMITTEE CONDITION HUMAN RIGHTS HONG KONG . HONG KONG GOVERNMENT ADHERED DEMANDS UNITED NATIONS LED HUMAN RIGHTS COMMITTEE
full_content_nostopwords: HONG KONG GOVERNMENT SUBMITS LATE HUMAN RIGHTS REPORT WITHIN DEADLINE , URGING UNITED NATIONS REVIEW HONG KONG 'S HUMAN RIGHTS RETROGRESSION TIMELY MANNER `` INTERNATIONAL COVENANT CIVIL POLITICAL RIGHTS '' ( HEREINAFTER REFERRED `` COVENANT '' ) STIPULATES STATE PARTY RESPONSIBILITY TAKE APPROPRIATE MEASURES PROTECT BASIC POLITICAL CIVIL RIGHTS HUMAN BEINGS . CONVENTION ENTERED FORCE 1976 , ALSO EXTENDED APPLY HONG KONG . SINO-BRITISH JOINT DECLARATION BASIC LAW STIPULATE PROVISIONS CONVENTION APPLICABLE HONG KONG SHALL REMAIN FORCE . THEREFORE , HONG KONG GOVERNMENT RESPONSIBILITY REGULARLY SUBMIT REPORTS UNITED NATIONS HUMAN RIGHTS COMMITTEE EXPLAIN HUMAN RIGHTS SITUATION HONG KONG . HONG KONG GOVERNMENT SUPPOSED SUBMIT FOURTH REPORT MARCH 30 , 2018 . PITY HONG KONG GOVERNMENT SUBMITTED REQUIRED UNITED NATIONS , UNITED NATIONS HUMAN RIGHTS COMMITTEE ARRANGE MEETING HEAR REVIEW HONG KONG REPORT MONITOR HONG KONG IMPLEMENTS CIVIL POLITICAL RIGHTS GUARANTEED ABOVE-MENTIONED CONVENTIONS . STRONGLY QUESTION PROTEST HONG KONG GOVERNMENT SUBMIT REPORT TIME REQUIRED , EVADE UNITED NATIONS ' MONITORING HUMAN RIGHTS SITUATION HONG KONG . SINCE GOVERNMENT 'S PUBLIC CONSULTATION DRAFTING REPORT ENDED 21 MONTHS AGO , BELIEVE GOVERNMENT ABSOLUTELY CAPABLE DRAFTING DOCUMENT ACCORDANCE REGULATIONS WITHIN 21 MONTHS . THEREFORE , SOLEMNLY CALL HONG KONG GOVERNMENT SUBMIT FOURTH REPORT UNITED NATIONS SEPTEMBER 28 , 2019 , EXPLAINING HUMAN RIGHTS SITUATION HONG KONG RECENT YEARS . CONDITIONS INCLUDE SUPPRESSION DEMONSTRATIONS , ASSEMBLIES , PROCESSIONS , POLITICAL PARTICIPATION RIGHTS ; ELECTED MEMBERS DISQUALIFIED MEMBERSHIP , CANDIDATES DEPRIVED QUALIFICATIONS STAND ELECTION ; PRESS FREEDOM SPEECH SUPPRESSED ; AUTHORITIES VIDEOTAPED MONITORED CITIZENS VIOLATE PERSONAL PRIVACY ; TORTURE , VIOLENCE , ABUSE POWER , VIOLATIONS WOMEN , ELDERLY , WEAK , INCLUDING SEXUAL ASSAULT ; LAW ENFORCEMENT SERIOUSLY UNFAIR DIFFERENT POLITICAL OPINIONS ; VARIOUS RIGHTS , INCLUDING LEGAL ADVICE , VIOLATED SUBJECTED POLITICAL PROSECUTIONS , AMONG THINGS . GOVERNMENT FAILS SUBMIT REPORT UNITED NATIONS DATE , STRONGLY APPEAL UN HUMAN RIGHTS COMMITTEE START PROCEDURE HEARING REVIEWING HONG KONG WITHOUT REPORT , FORCING HONG KONG GOVERNMENT FACE RETROGRESSION SOON POSSIBLE SITUATION HONG KONG DETERIORATES HUMANITARIAN DISASTER FIND SOLUTION HUMAN RIGHTS ISSUES HONG KONG , STOP HONG KONG 'S CURRENT COMPREHENSIVE HUMAN RIGHTS REGRESSION , EFFECTIVELY PROTECT HONG KONG 'S RULE LAW CIVIL POLITICAL RIGHTS , RESTORE PAST PEACE BASED UNIVERSAL VALUES , RESTORE HONG KONG . CIVIL HUMAN RIGHTS FRONT HONG KONG GOVERNMENT YET SUBMIT HUMAN RIGHTS REPORT SUBMISSION URGE UNITED NATIONS LOOK DECLINE HUMAN RIGHTS CITY SIGNATORIES INTERNATIONAL COVENANT CIVIL POLITICAL RIGHTS RESPONSIBILITY TAKE MEASURES ENSURE PROTECTION BASIC CIVIL POLITICAL RIGHTS . COVENANT CAME EFFECT 1976 EXTENDED HONG KONG . SINO-BRITISH JOINT DECLARATION BASIC LAW STATE COVENANT APPLICABLE HONG KONG CONTINUES TAKE EFFECT . RESULT , HKSAR GOVERNMENT RESPONSIBILITY SUBMIT REPORTS UNITED NATIONS HUMAN RIGHTS COMMITTEE CONDITION HUMAN RIGHTS HONG KONG . HONG KONG GOVERNMENT SUPPOSED SUBMIT 4TH REPORT MARCH 30TH 2018 . HOWEVER , TILL HONG KONG GOVERNMENT ADHERED DEMANDS UNITED NATIONS LED HUMAN RIGHTS COMMITTEE MEMBERS UNABLE PROCEED MEETING DISCUSS EVALUATE HONG KONG REPORT MONITOR WHETHER HONG KONG 'S CIVIL POLITICAL RIGHTS PROTECTED . CIVIL HUMAN RIGHTS FRONT STRONGLY OBJECTS LATE SUBMISSION HONG KONG REPORT CONDEMNS GOVERNMENT AVOIDING UNITED NATIONS ' MONIT ORING HUMAN RIGHTS CONDITIONS HONG KONG . PUBLIC CONSULTATION REPORT COMPLETED 21 MONTHS AGO , STRONGLY BELIEVE GOVERNMENT ENOUGH TIME COMPLETE 4TH REPORT UPDATE COMMITTEE LATEST HUMAN RIGHTS CONDITION HONG KONG 28TH SEPTEMBER . title_cleaned_nostopwords: TELL JOE BIDEN STOP UINTA BASIN RAILWAY !
description_nostopwords: IRRESPONSIBLE INCREDIBLY DAMAGING PEOPLE DEPENDING COLORADO RIVER CLEAN WATER LESS DECADE LEFT SWITCH RENEWABLE ENERGY LATE . DEPENDENCE CAMPAIGN SUPPORT RENEWABLE ENERGY CONSERVATION . , BECOME ABUNDANTLY CLEAR
full_content_nostopwords: UINTA BASIN SURROUNDING AREAS NAMED `` ONE STUPENDOUS FEATURES COUNTRY '' EXPLORER JOHN WESLEY POWELL . , BECOME LIFELESS WASTELAND , MONOTONY PUNCTURED OIL WELLS THICK SMOG CHOKING HORIZON . UINTA BASIN HOME RICH OIL DEPOSITS , OIL COMPANIES SLOWLY SURELY EXTRACTING DECADES . HOWEVER , EFFORTS SLOWED DIFFICULT TRANSPORT OIL PLACES USED . MAY TRUE MUCH LONGER . UTAH REPRESENTATIVES PROPOSING 88-MILE RAILWAY WOULD ALLOW OIL COMPANIES UINTA BASIN QUADRUPLE EXPORTS . PRESIDENT BIDEN MAKING MOVE STRIKE . RAILWAY WOULD SPELL DISASTER PRECIOUS PRISTINE LAND UTAH . RAILWAY WOULD POLLUTE 400 PRECIOUS STREAMS , MANY LEADING COLORADO RIVER , PROVIDES DRINKING WATER 40 MILLION PEOPLE . TIME MUCH WEST GRIPS DROUGHT , AFFORD LOSE WATER SOURCE . GOING RAILWAY PLAN WOULD IRRESPONSIBLE INCREDIBLY DAMAGING PEOPLE DEPENDING COLORADO RIVER CLEAN WATER . CONSTRUCTION PASS DIRECTLY VITAL BIG-GAME MIGRATION ROUTES DISRUPT BREEDING GROUNDS ENDANGERED GREATER SAGE GROUSE . BIDEN ADMINISTRATION ALSO APPROVED PASSING RAILWAY ASHLEY NATIONAL FOREST , LAND SUPPOSED PROTECTED GOVERNMENT . DAMAGES RAILWAY GO BEYOND UNITED STATES . SCIENCE REPEATEDLY TOLD US LESS DECADE LEFT SWITCH RENEWABLE ENERGY LATE . DEPENDENCE FOSSIL FUELS KILLING US , NEED ACT WANT CHANCE SURVIVAL . JOE BIDEN PROMISED PROTECT PLANET . SINCE BEGINNING , CORNERSTONE CAMPAIGN SUPPORT RENEWABLE ENERGY CONSERVATION . , BECOME ABUNDANTLY CLEAR WORDS NOTHING EMPTY PROMISES . JOE BIDEN BECOME NOTHING ANOTHER PUPPET POLITICIAN , CONTROLLED OIL COMPANIES VOWED OPPOSE . UNITED STATES OIL GAS PRODUCTION SPIKED BIDEN ADMINISTRATION . PRESS CONFERENCE , FLOUTED FACT ALREADY APPROVED 9,000 OIL DRILLING PERMITS FEDERAL LAND , CAVING CORPORATE INTEREST SOMETHING PROUD . INCREASE OIL PRODUCTION CAUSED RAILWAY COULD RELEASE MUCH 53 MILLION POUNDS CARBON DIOXIDE AIR ANNUALLY . ALLOWING LAND USED FOSSIL FUELS STEP BACKWARDS . LATE STOP UINTA BASIN RAILWAY . BIDEN 'S CHANCE SHOW US 'S SIDE ; MILLIONS PEOPLE SUPPOSED SERVE , MEGA-RICH COMPANIES SEEKS PLEASE . FIGHT SURVIVAL . WARMING PLANET SHOWN US STORE CONTINUE TREAT WORLD LIKE DUMPING GROUND . MAKE VOICES HEARD , REMIND BIDEN PROMISES MADE US CAMPAIGN . PLEASE SHARE PETITION MUCH , PARTICIPATE PROTESTS , ROLE MODEL CLIMATE-FRIENDLY FUTURE . full_content_nostopwords: IMPORTANCE ENDANGERED SPECIES HEALTHY ECOSYSTEMS DEPEND PLANT ANIMAL SPECIES FOUNDATIONS . SPECIES BECOMES ENDANGERED , SIGN ECOSYSTEM SLOWLY FALLING APART . SPECIES LOST TRIGGERS LOSS SPECIES WITHIN ECOSYSTEM . AGRICULTURE ALSO PLAYS IMPORTANT ROLE PROTECTION SPECIES , FARMERS OFTEN SEEN ORIGINAL CONSERVATIONISTS . MANY FARMERS SET ASIDE PORTIONS LAND WILDLIFE HABITAT ALSO WORK PARTNERSHIP GROUPS TROUT UNLIMITED RESTORE RIVER STREAM HABITATS ENDANGERED THREATENED FISH REPTILES . ACCORDING WORLD ATLAS , “ MEGADIVERSITY ” REFERS COUNTRIES HARBOR “ HIGH TOTAL NUMBER SPECIES INCLUDING SIGNIFICANT PERCENTAGE ENDEMIC SPECIES. ” COUNTRY CLASSIFIED “ MEGADIVERSE ” , MUST LEAST 5,000 SPECIES ENDEMIC PLANTS BORDER MARINE ECOSYSTEM . “ PER UNIT AREA BASIS , PHILIPPINES PROBABLY HARBORS DIVERSITY LIFE COUNTRY PLANET , ” DENR-BMB WEB SITE SAID . PHILIPPINES CONSIDERED ONE 17 MEGADIVERSE COUNTRIES WORLD . COUNTRY ’ FOREST ECOSYSTEM HOSTS DIVERSE ARRAY PLANT ANIMAL SPECIES . MATTER FACT , DEPARTMENT ENVIRONMENT NATURAL RESOURCES ( DENR ) REPORTED PHILIPPINES HOME 52,177 DESCRIBED SPECIES , INDIGENOUS REGION . ALTHOUGH PHILIPPINES “ HIGH DEGREE LAND ANIMAL ENDEMISM , ” ALSO TAGGED BIODIVERSITY HOTSPOT NUMBER ENDANGERED THREATENED SPECIES CONTINUES GROW DUE HABITAT LOSS INHUMANE ANIMAL ACTIVITIES . FACT , NUMBER RESIDENT SPECIES — CULTIVATED HUNTED FOOD — MAY HEADING EXTINCTION , LIKE CRITICALLY ENDANGERED TAMARAW VISAYAN WARTY PIG . PARTLY DUE HUMAN CONSUMPTION , SEA TURTLES ( LIKE GREEN LOGGERHEAD TURTLE ) REMAIN ENDANGERED . MANY WAYS CONSERVE PROTECT SPECIES . PEACE AGREEMENT , COLOMBIAN STATE ENTERED BINDING FUNDAMENTAL COMMITMENTS , ORDER ACHIEVE STRUCTURAL SOCIAL CHANGES PROPERLY FIGHT INEQUALITY LEAD TRULY PEACEFUL ENVIRONMENT.UNFORTUNATELY GREAT MAJORITY CITIZENS , SINCE LAST YEAR , POLITICAL FORCES MAINTAINED POWER COLOMBIA YEAR PROMOTING WAR FEAR , SUCCEEDED TAKING PRESIDENCY . SINCE , PRESIDENCY IVÁN DUQUE MÁRQUEZ , MANY ATTACKS LONG-HOPED-FOR PEACE . INSTANCE , FIRST EIGHT MONTHS PRESIDENCY , TOTAL 172 SOCIAL LEADERS HUMAN RIGHTS ACTIVISTS MURDERED COLOMBIA , ACCORDING REPORT INSTITUTE DEVELOPMENT PEACE STUDIES ( INDEPAZ ) . LIKEWISE , OBJECTIVE IMPEDING PEACEMAKING PROCESS COLOMBIA , SPECIAL JURISDICTION PEACE ( JEP ) ATTACK PRESIDENT , ALLIES CONGRESS , ATTORNEY GENERAL 'S OFFICE ( POLITICALLY CO-OPTED ) , SUPPORT IMPROPER INTERVENTION COLOMBIAN INTERNAL AFFAIRS U.S. PRESIDENT DONALD TRUMP . THROUGHOUT GRIEVOUS RECENT EVENTS , COLOMBIAN GOVERNMENT POLITICAL ALLIES SHOWN PERSONAL INTERESTS TAKE PREFERENCE WELFARE ENTIRE NATION.FOR REASON , COLOMBIANS FIND URGENT NEED EVERYTHING POSSIBLE PREVENT IMPOSITION POLITICAL AGENDA PERPETUATES WAR IMPEDES EXERCISE DEMOCRACY . REASONS , ASK SUPPORT INTERNATIONAL COMMUNITY LEADERS WORLD ALLIES ACHIEVEMENT PEACE COLOMBIA , FOLLOWING PURPOSES : PEACE COST US LIFE FREEDOM . FOLLOW SIGNATURES ... PLEASE ADD ! -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- - SPANISH EL GOBIERNO DE COLOMBIA : SU DOBLE DISCURSO SU TRAICIÓN LOS ACUERDOS DE PAZ LAS CIUDADANÍAS LIBRES DE COLOMBIA , UNIDAS POR VOLUNTAD PROPIA , ANHELANTES DE CONSTRUIR UN FUTURO MEJOR PARA LAS GENERACIONES VENIDERAS , MANIFESTAMOS LA OPINIÓN PÚBLICA INTERNACIONAL QUE : NINGÚN COLOMBIANO HA VIVIDO EN PAZ EN NUESTRO PAÍS . TODOS SOMOS HEMOS SIDO VÍCTIMAS DE LA VIOLENCIA . UNA VIOLENCIA CAUSADA POR LA CONCENTRACIÓN PERMANENTE DEL PODER POLÍTICO EN MANOS DE REDUCIDOS SECTORES ECONÓMICAMENTE PRIVILEGIADOS , QUE HAN USADO LAS LEYES EN BENEFICIO PROPIO , CONDENANDO LA MAYORÍA DE LA POBLACION LA MÁS DESHONROSA POBREZA . LA INEQUIDAD SOCIAL CAUSADA POR LAS MALAS PRÁCTICAS POLÍTICAS , HA SIDO EL PRINCIPAL ALIMENTO DE LA GUERRA QUE , SU VEZ , HA PRODUCIDO MILES DE MUERTOS LO LARGO DE LOS AÑOS . UNO DE LAS ETAPAS MÁS VIOLENTAS VIVIDAS EN NUESTRA HISTORIA RECIENTE , TRANSCURRIÓ ENTRE LOS AÑOS 1998 2010 , LAPSO CORRESPONDIENTE LOS PERIODOS PRESIDENCIALES DE ANDRÉS PASTRANA ARANGO ÁLVARO URIBE VÉLEZ , ACTUALMENTE OPOSITORES FÉRREOS UNA SALIDA NEGOCIADA AL CONFLICTO COLOMBIANO . SEGÚN CIFRAS DEL GOBIERNO COLOMBIANO , EN DICHO PERIODO SE REGISTRARON 5.827.898 VÍCTIMAS DIRECTAS DE GUERRA , AFECTADAS POR SITUACIONES DE MUERTE , DESPLAZAMIENTO , SECUESTROS HAMBRE . ESTE MACABRO NÚMERO DE VÍCTIMAS SÓLO TUVO UN GIRO DURANTE EL PERÍODO PRESIDENCIAL 2010 – 2018 , CUANDO EL ENTONCES PRESIDENTE JUAN MANUEL SANTOS , HOY NOBEL DE PAZ , COMO JEFE DE ESTADO FIRMÓ EL ACUERDO DE PAZ DE LA HABANA , CON EL GRUPO GUERRILLERO FUERZAS ARMADAS REVOLUCIONARIAS DE COLOMBIA ( FARC – EP ) , HECHO QUE CONTÓ CON EL RESPALDO DE LA COMUNIDAD INTERNACIONAL . MEDIANTE ESTE ACUERDO DE PAZ , EL ESTADO COLOMBIANO ADQUIRIÓ COMPROMISOS FUNDAMENTALES , CON EL FIN DE LOGRAR CAMBIOS SOCIALES ESTRUCTURALES QUE PERMITIERAN LUCHAR CONTRA LA DESIGUALDAD DE LA POBLACIÓN GENERAR UN AMBIENTE DE VERDADERA PAZ . LAMENTABLEMENTE PARA LA GRAN MAYORÍA DE LA CIUDADANÍA , LAS FUERZAS POLÍTICAS QUE DURANTE AÑOS HAN PROMOVIDO CONSEGUIDO SU PERMANENCIA EN EL PODER EN COLOMBIA , SUSTENTADAS EN ACCIONES DE GUERRA MIEDO , LOGRARON RETOMAR DESDE EL AÑO PASADO LA PRESIDENCIA DE LAREPUBLICA , TRAVÉS DEL HOY PRIMER MANDATARIO IVÁN DUQUE MÁRQUEZ . DESDE ESE MISMO MOMENTO , HAN SIDO MUCHOS LOS ATAQUES QUE HA RECIBIDO NUESTRA ESPERANZA DE LOGRAR LA PAZ . PARA EJEMPLIFICAR , DURANTE LOS PRIMEROS 8 MESES DEL GOBIERNO ACTUAL , UN TOTAL DE 172 LÍDERES SOCIALES DEFENSORAS DE DERECHOS HUMANOS HAN SIDO ASESINADAS EN COLOMBIA , SEGÚN INFORME DEL INSTITUTO DE ESTUDIOS SOBRE PAZ DESARROLLO – INDEPAZ . ASÍ MISMO , CON EL OBJETIVO DE AFECTAR LA PAZ EN COLOMBIA , EL MISMO PRESIDENTE , SU BANCADA ALIADA EN EL CONGRESO DE LA REPÚBLICA LA FISCALÍA GENERAL DE LA NACIÓN ( COOPTADA POR LAS YA MENCIONADAS FUERZAS GUERRERISTAS ) , RESPALDADOS POR LA INDEBIDA INTERVENCIÓN DEL PRESIDENTE DE ESTADOS UNIDOS , DONALD TRUMP , EN LOS ASUNTOS INTERNOS DE LOS COLOMBIANOS , HAN DIRIGIDO ATAQUES AL TRIBUNAL ESPECIAL PARA LA PAZ – JEP . DICHO TRIBUNAL ES UN ORGANISMO JUDICIAL QUE CONSTITUYE EL CORAZÓN DE LOS ACUERDOS DE PAZ ( NOVIEMBRE 2016 ) , AL SER EL ENCARGADO DE INVESTIGAR LOS HECHOS DE VIOLENCIA DE BUSCAR LA JUSTICIA , VERDAD REPARACION PARA LAS VÍCTIMAS DEL CONFLICTO ARMADO . MEDIANTE LOS GRAVES ACONTECIMIENTOS DE LOS ÚLTIMOS DÍAS , EL GOBIERNO NACIONAL DE COLOMBIA SUS ALIADOS POLÍTICOS , HAN DEMOSTRADO QUE SUS INTERESES PERSONALES ESTÁN POR ENCIMA DEL BIENESTAR DE TODO UN PAÍS . POR ESTE MOTIVO LOS COLOMBIANOS NOS VEMOS EN LA IMPERIOSA NECESIDAD DE HACER TODO LO POSIBLE PARA IMPEDIR QUE SE IMPONGA LA AGENDA POLÍTICA QUE PERPETÚA LA GUERRA QUE IMPIDE EL EJERCICIO DE LA DEMOCRACIA . POR LAS RAZONES EXPUESTAS , PEDIMOS LA SOLIDARIDAD DE LA COMUNIDAD INTERNACIONAL LOS LÍDERES DEL MUNDO QUE HAN SIDO NUESTROS ALIADOS EN LA CONSECUCIÓN DE LA PAZ EN COLOMBIA , PARA QUE NOS RESPALDEN EN NUESTROS SIGUIENTES PROPÓSITOS : QUE LA PAZ NOS CUESTE LA VIDA NI LA LIBERTAD . -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- CATALAN MAIG DE 2019 GOVERN DE COLÒMBIA : DOBLE DISCURS TRAICIÓ ALS ACORDS DE PAU LES CIUTADANIES LLIURES DE COLÒMBIA , UNIDES PER VOLUNTAT PRÒPIA , AMB L ’ ANHEL DE CONSTRUIR UN FUTURMILLOR PER LES GENERACIONS QUE HAN DE VENIR , MANIFESTEM L ’ OPINIÓ PÚBLICA INTERNACIONAL QUE : CAP COLOMBIÀ HA VISCUT EN PAU AL NOSTRE PAÍS . TOTS SOM HEM ESTAT VÍCTIMES DE LA VIOLÈNCIA . UNAVIOLÈNCIA CAUSADA PER LA CONCENTRACIÓ PERMANENT DEL PODER POLÍTIC EN MANS ’ UNS POCS SECTORSECONÒMICAMENT PRIVILEGIATS , QUE HAN FET SERVIR LES LLEIS EN BENEFICI PROPI , CONDEMNANT LA MAJORIA DE LA POBLACIÓ LA POBRESA MÉS DESHONROSA . LA DESIGUALTAT SOCIAL CAUSADA PER LES MALES PRÀCTIQUES POLÍTIQUES HA ESTAT EL QUE , PRINCIPALMENT , HA ALIMENTAT LA GUERRA , QUE LA VEGADA HA PROVOCAT MILERS DE MORTS DURANT MOLTS ’ ANYS . UNA DE LES ETAPES MÉS VIOLENTES DE LA NOSTRA HISTÒRIA RECENT VA TRANSCÓRRER DURANT ELS ANYS DE 1998 2010 , DURANT ELS PERÍODES PRESIDENCIALS ’ ANDRÉS PASTRANA ARANGO ÁLVARO URIBE VÉLEZ , EN L ’ ACTUALITAT OPOSATS FÈRRIAMENT UNA SORTIDA NEGOCIADA DEL CONFLICTE COLOMBIÀ . SEGONS XIFRES DEL GOVERN COLOMBIÀ , EN AQUESTA ETAPA ES VAREN REGISTRAR 5.827.989 VÍCTIMES DE GUERRA DIRECTES , AFECTADES PER SITUACIONS DE MORT , DESPLAÇAMENT , SEGREST FAM . AQUEST MACABRE NÚMERO DE VÍCTIMES NOMÉS VA TENIR UN TOMB DURANT EL PERÍODE PRESIDENT DEL 2010 AL 2018 , QUANL ’ ALESHORES PRESIDENT JUAN MANUEL SANTOS , AVUI NOBEL DE LA PAU , VA SIGNAR COM CAP ’ ESTAT L ’ ACORD DE PAU DE L ’ HABANA AMB EL GRUP GUERRILLER FUERZAS ARMADAS REVOLUCIONARIAS DE COLOMBIA ( FARC-EP ) , FET QUE VA COMPTAR AMB EL RECOLZAMENT DE LA COMUNITAT INTERNACIONAL . VA SER PER AQUEST ACORD DE PAU QUE L ’ ESTAT COLOMBIÀ VA ADQUIRIR COMPROMISOS FONAMENTALS PER TAL ’ ACONSEGUIR CANVIS SOCIALS ESTRUCTURALS QUE PERMETESSIN LLUITAR CONTRA LA DESIGUALTAT DE LAPOBLACIÓ GENERAR UN AMBIENT DE PAU VERITABLE . LAMENTABLEMENT PER LA GRAN MAJORIA DE LA CIUTADANIA , LES FORCES POLÍTIQUES QUE DURANT ANYS HAN PROCURAT ACONSEGUIT ROMANDRE EN EL PODER COLÒMBIA , SOSTINGUTS EN ACCIONS DE GUERRA IPOR , VAREN ACONSEGUIR REPRENDRE , DES DE L ’ PASSAT , LA PRESIDÈNCIA DE LA REPÚBLICA TRAVÉS DELQUE AVUI ÉS EL PRIMER MANDATARI IVÁN DUQUE MÁRQUEZ . DES ’ AQUEST MATEIX MOMENT , HAN ESTAT MOLTS ELS ATACS QUE HA REBUT LA NOSTRA ESPERANÇA ’ ACONSEGUIR LA PAU . PER EXEMPLE , DURANT ELSPRIMERS 8 MESOS DEL GOVERN ACTUAL , UN TOTAL DE 172 LÍDERS SOCIALS DEFENSORES DE DRETS HUMANS HAN ESTAT ASSASSINATS COLÒMBIA , SEGONS INFORME DE L ’ INSTITUTO DE ESTUDIOS SOBRE PAZ DESARROLLO – INDEPAZ.AIXÍ MATEIX , AMB L ’ OBJECTIU ’ AFECTAR LA PAU COLÒMBIA , EL MATEIX PRESIDENT , LA SEVA BANCADAALIADA EN EL CONGRÉS DE LA REPÚBLICA LA FISCALIA GENERAL DE LA NACIÓ ( COOPTADA PER LES ANOMENADES FORCES GUERRILLISTES ) RECOLZATS PER UNA INTERVENCIÓ INDEGUDA DEL PRESIDENT ’ ESTATSUNITS , DONALD TRUMP , EN ELS ASSUMPTES INTERNS COLOMBIANS , HAN DIRIGIT ATACS AL TRIBUNAL ESPECIAL PARA AL PAZ – JEP . AQUEST TRIBUNAL ÉS UN ORGANISME JUDICIAL QUE CONSTITUEIX EL COR DELS ACORDS DEPAU , JA QUE ÉS L ’ ENCARREGAT ’ INVESTIGAR ELS ACTES DE VIOLÈNCIA DE BUSCAR LA JUSTÍCA , VERITAT IREPARACIÓ PER LES VÍCTIMES DEL CONFLICTE ARMAT . PER MITJÀ DELS GREUS ESDEVENIMENTS DELS ÚLTIMS DIES , EL GOVERN NACIONAL DE COLÒMBIA ELS SEUS ALIATS POLÍTICS , HAN DEMOSTRAR QUE ELS SEUS INTERESSOS PERSONALS ESTAN PER SOBRE EL BENESTAR DE TOT UN PAÍS . PER AQUEST MOTIU ELS COLOMBIANS ENS VEIEM EN LA IMPERIOSA NECESSITAT DE FER TOT EL POSSIBLE PERTAL ’ IMPEDIR QUE ’ IMPOSI L ’ AGENDA POLÍTICA QUE PERPETUA LA GUERRA QUE IMPEDEIX L ’ EXERCICI DELA DEMOCRÀCIA . PER TOTES LES RAONS EXPOSADES , DEMANEM SOLIDÀRIAMENT LA COMUNITAT INTERNACIONAL ALS LÍDERS DEL MÓN QUE HAN ESTAT ELS NOSTRES ALIATS EN LA CONSECUCIÓ DE LA PAU COLÒMBIA , QUE ENS RECOLZIN EN ELS SEGÜENTS PROPÒSITS : 1.- QUE ES BRINDIN GARANTIES LÍDERS SOCIALS , DEFENSORS DEFENSORES DE DRETS HUMANS , RECLAMANTS DE TERRES , EX COMBATENTS DE GRUPS GUERRILLERS REINSERITS CIVILS , QUE SISTEMÀTICAMENT ESTAN ESSENT ASSASSINATS AL NOSTRE PAÍS . 2.- QUE SIGUIN RESPECTATS ’ ACOMPLEIXIN ELS ACORDS DE PAU SUBSCRITS PER L ’ ESTAT COLOMBIÀ AMB L ’ EXTINT GRUP GUERRILLER DE LAS FARC-EP . 3.- QUE EL GOVERN NACIONAL DE COLÒMBIA REPRENGUI LES CONVERSES DE PAU AMB EL GRUP GUERRILLEREJÉRCITO DE LIBERACIÓN NACIONAL ( ELN ) PER TAL ’ ACONSEGUIR UNA PAU VERITABLE , ESTABLE DURADORA . 4.- QUE SIGUI RESPECTADA LA JUSTICIA ESPECIAL DE PAZ-JEP , QUE BUSCA INVESTIGAR ACLARIR ELS CRIMS DE GUERRA COMESOS PER TOTS ELS ACTORS DEL CONFLICTE COLÒMBIA . 5.- QUE SIGUI RESPECTADA LA VIDA ES GARANTEIXI LES CONDICIONS PER LA PARTICIPACIÓ DE L ’ OPOSICIÓPOLÍTICA . 6.- QUE SIGUI RESPECTADA LA INDEPENDÈNCIA JUDICIAL COLÒMBIA .
