LONG AGO EARLY 2013 , HEART BROKE READ 13-YEAR OLD GIRL ’ STORY , SHARED EVERYDAY SEXISM PROJECT . WROTE SCARED SEX WOULD CRY NEARLY EVERY NIGHT . BOY SCHOOL SHOWN VIDEO MOBILE PHONE , ’ UNDERSTAND “ REAL LIFE SEX SEE SCARY PAINFUL WOMAN CRYING GETTING HURT. ” WENT : “ TRY THINK N'T WORRY ’ AGES EVERYONE SCHOOL KEEPS ACTING LIKE ’ NORMAL ’ MEANT REALLY SOON LIKE BOYS KEEP ASKING DONE SHOWING HORRIBLE PICTURES THINGS. ” SINCE , PROBLEM GOT WORSE BETTER , YET , STILL GOVERNMENT RESISTS MAKING SEX RELATIONSHIPS EDUCATION FORMAL PART CURRICULUM . 13-YEAR OLD ONE THOUSANDS YOUNG PEOPLE CONFUSED MISINFORMED SEE ONLINE PORNOGRAPHY . ONE SCHOOL VISITED , TEACHERS DEALING RAPE CASE INVOLVING 14-YEAR OLD BOY . TEACHER ASKED : “ ’ STOP CRYING ? ” REPLIED : “ ’ NORMAL GIRLS CRY SEX. ” YOUNG PEOPLE BOMBARDED CONFUSING OFTEN MISOGYNISTIC MESSAGES WORLD AROUND -- 60 % SEEN ONLINE PORN AGE 14 . TEENAGE GIRLS GETTING PRESSURED SEX , RECENT BBC FREEDOM INFORMATION REQUEST REVEALED 5,500 SEXUAL OFFENCES , INCLUDING 600 RAPES , REPORTED POLICE TAKEN PLACE SCHOOLS 3-YEAR PERIOD . ’ ALMOST EXACTLY ONE RAPE PER SCHOOL DAY . NEED COMPULSORY SEX RELATIONSHIPS EDUCATION ( SRE ) . ’ SCANDAL SCHOOLS EQUIP YOUNG PEOPLE SKILLS NEED UNDERSTAND CONSENT , HEALTHY RELATIONSHIPS , LGBT RIGHTS RELATIONSHIPS , GENDER STEREOTYPES ONLINE PORNOGRAPHY.WHILE PARENTS MAY SPEAK CHILDREN ISSUES INDIVIDUALLY , , SADLY CHILDREN ALREADY EXPERIENCING SEXUAL ABUSE OUTSIDE CLASSROOM . OWE EVERY CHILD CLEAR , AGE-APPROPRIATE INFORMATION , UNDERSTAND ABUSE ’ NORMAL , LEARN NAVIGATE HEALTHY RELATIONSHIPS . ’ IMPORTANT LEAVE CHANCE . description_nostopwords: JUSTICE SEPHORA BOUCHAHDANE , 16 YEARS OLD ! FEBRUARY 20 , 2018 , SEPHORA
full_content_nostopwords: JUSTICE SEPHORA BOUCHAHDANE , 16 YEARS OLD ! FEBRUARY 20 , 2018 , 16-YEAR-OLD SÉPHORA BOUCHAHDANE LEFT FAMILY HOME LAST TIME . SÉPHORA SETS HIGH SCHOOL , LYCÉE CHÂTELET LOCATED DOUAI . LIKE EVERY TIME , WAITS BUS STOP . TIME , MOTORIST HITS HEAD-ON . FELL ASLEEP BROAD DAYLIGHT , DRIVING VEHICLE . ZIPPORAH SUCCUMB INJURIES TWO HOURS LATER , GIVE GHOST . DRIVER VEHICLE INTOXICATED INFLUENCE NARCOTICS… ! SUFFERING SLEEPING SICKNESS EXPERT REPORTS SHOW . MAN FALL ASLEEP WHEEL , TIME , KNOWS ! TODAY , OFFICE PUBLIC PROSECUTOR DELIVERED VERDICT : CASE CLOSED WITHOUT SUITE . ZERO CRIMINAL CONVICTION , ZERO ADMINISTRATIVE SANCTION , NOTHING . ONE WORD : IN-DI-GNA-TION . PATIENCE FORGIVENESS ANIMATE LOVED ONES DECEASED . ZIPPORAH LIGHT EYES . TODAY LONGER DIGNITY FACE MULTIPLE TRIALS LIFE STORE . ROOM HATRED , FAMILY SHOWS GREAT HUMILITY TOWARDS DRIVER . N'T WANT FINANCIAL COMPENSATION INTEREST : WO N'T BRING ZIPPORAH BACK ! WANT JAILED EITHER , INTEREST FAMILY . SINGLE : NEVER TRAGEDY ! , EVERYONE 'S SAFETY : PLEASE TAKE AWAY LICENSE . NEVER HAPPENS EVERYONE 'S SAFETY : NEED ! ASKING SUPPORT : SIGN PETITION ! LET 'S PRESERVE LIVES LOVED ONES . title_cleaned_nostopwords: LET 'S STOP DISCRIMINATION ! IMMEDIATELY REPEAL ARTICLE 16 LAW . 18​.​600
description_nostopwords: INEQUALITY PROTECTED LAW . BILL 18.600 16TH ARTICLE , POINTS DIRECT CLEAR
full_content_nostopwords: STATE CHILE PROMOTES DISCRIMINATION AMONG CITIZENS : TODAY CHILE , 39.2 % PEOPLE DISABILITIES WORKING AGE JOB . , AVERAGE , RECEIVE SALARY 31.9 % LOWER REST ADULTS HIRED COUNTRY . INEQUALITY PROTECTED LAW . ARTICLE 16 LAW 18,600 , ESTABLISHES REGULATIONS MENTALLY DEFICIENT , CLEARLY DIRECTLY STATES : '' EMPLOYMENT CONTRACT ENTERED PERSON MENTAL DISABILITIES , REMUNERATION FREELY AGREED PARTIES MAY STIPULATED , APPLYING RULES MINIMUM INCOME REGARD '' PROFOUNDLY DISCRIMINATORY RULE UNDERVALUES ​​PEOPLE DISABILITIES ENCOURAGES ABUSE EMPLOYERS , ALLOWING DIFFERENT REMUNERATION ESTABLISHED JOB . TODAY , CONGRESS DISCUSSING IMPLEMENTATION QUOTA LAW SEEKS ENSURE SPACE PEOPLE DISABILITIES , FORCING PRIVATE PUBLIC COMPANIES 200 WORKERS LEAST 1 % EMPLOYEES DISABILITIES . CONTEXT WISHING SYSTEM CONSIDERS EVERYONE POTENTIALLY PRODUCTIVE SUBJECT CHARITY , ASK SENATORS DEPUTIES REPUBLIC CHILE : BELIEVE CONTRIBUTE CONTINUE BUILDING FAIRER EQUITABLE COUNTRY , ESPECIALLY TERMS HUMAN LABOR RIGHTS , SOCIAL LABOR INCLUSION PEOPLE DISABILITIES . EFFECTIVE LABOR INCLUSION OBTAINING PAID JOB , ALSO GENERATION STABILITY DEVELOPMENT EQUAL OPPORTUNITIES CONDITIONS . -- -- - SPANISH STATE CHILE , ENCOURAGES DISCRIMINATION AMONG CITIZENS : NOWADAYS CHILE , 39.2 % PEOPLE DISABILITIES WITHIN WORKING AGE JOB . AVERAGE , RECEIVE SALARY 31.9 % LOWER REST ADULTS HIRED COUNTRY . INEQUALITY PROTECTED LAW . BILL 18,600 16TH ARTICLE , POINTS DIRECT CLEAR FASHION : “ WORKING CONTRACT HELD INDIVIDUAL MENTAL DISABILITY , PROVIDE SALARY FREELY AGREED AMONG PARTS , APPLYING REGARD , REGULATIONS MINIMUM WAGE ” REGULATION STRONG SENSE DISCRIMINATION , UNDERMINES PEOPLE DISABILITIES ENCOURAGES ABUSE BEHAVIOR EMPLOYERS , ALLOWING WORK ALIKE , RECEIVING LESS REMUNERATION . CURRENTLY , DEBATE CONGRESS IMPLEMENTATION QUOTAS LAW , SEEKS ENSURE PLACE DISABLED , FORCING PRIVATE PUBLIC COMPANIES 200 HUNDRED WORKERS , LEAST 1 % EMPLOYEES DISABILITIES . CONTEXT , LOOKING FORWARD SYSTEM CONSIDERS EVERYONE PRODUCTIVE POTENTIAL , CHARITY WORK , ASK SENATE CHAMBER DEPUTIES CHILE : BELIEVE MAY CONTRIBUTE EQUAL COUNTRY , ESPECIALLY REGARDS HUMAN RIGHTS , WORKING RIGHTS SOCIAL INTEGRATION , WITHIN PEOPLE DISABILITIES . EFFECTIVE WORKING INTEGRATION GOES BEYOND SOLE PROCUREMENT PAID JOB , ALSO RESULT STABILITY PERSONAL DEVELOPMENT EQUAL CONDITIONS OPPORTUNITIES .

SPECIALISTS ENDOCRINE SYSTEM , TITLE , ENDOCRINOLOGIST , EXPRESSES EXPERTISE RICHNESS EXPERIENCE . DESPITE PROMISE TITLE , , PATIENTS THYROID DYSFUNCTION , STILL SUFFERING . QUALITY LIVES DIMINISHED DUE DIFFICULTY FINDING DOCTORS EFFECTIVE THYROID MANAGEMENT . PATIENT EXPERIENCE SEEMS DEMONSTRATE LARGE NUMBERS ENDOCRINOLOGISTS UNABLE DIAGNOSE THYROID DISORDER AND/OR OUTDATED KNOWLEDGE TREATMENT METHODS . NEED LARGE SUPPORT BASE GAIN CREDIBILITY DESERVE . VISIT THYROIDCHANGE RESOURCES INFORMATION . PETITION CALLS FOLLOWING ACTIONS:1 ) DOCTORS MUST DEMONSTRATE PROFICIENCY DIAGNOSIS TREATMENTS THYROID DISORDERS RECEIVING HIS/HER BOARD CERTIFICATION ENDOCRINOLOGY . COULD COMPREHENSIVE SECTION EXISTING BOARD EXAMINATION INCLUDES USE TESTING FREE T3 , FREE T4 , REVERSE T3 , THYROID ANTIBODIES ALONG TSH . ENDOCRINOLOGISTS ALSO PROFICIENT USE THYROID TREATMENT INCLUDES USE NATURAL DESSICATED THYROID MEDICATION , T3-ONLY MEDICATION , T4-ONLY MEDICATION , WELL COMBINATION THERAPIES.2 ) BOARD-CERTIFIED ENDOCRINOLOGISTS TREAT THYROID DISORDER MUST KEEP UP-TO-DATE CURRENT THYROID DISORDER TREATMENTS . TREATMENTS INCORPORATED ALREADY ESTABLISHED CONTINUED MEDICAL EDUCATION ( CME ) PROGRAMS . CONTINUING EDUCATION AREA MAINTAINED KEEP CERTIFICATION ENDOCRINOLOGY . INEXCUSABLE ENDOCRINOLOGISTS TREATING THYROID PATIENTS READING CURRENT PRACTICES DISCIPLINE USE NATURAL THYROID , T3-ONLY MEDICATION T3/T4 COMBINATION THERAPIES.MANY PATIENTS SPEAKING INADEQUACY T4-ONLY SYNTHETIC DRUGS . PATIENTS NATURAL THYROID TYPICALLY EXPRESS IMPROVEMENT QUALITY LIFE . IMPROVEMENTS ALSO REPORTED PATIENTS USING T3/T4 TREATMENTS T3-ONLY , OPPOSED SYNTHETIC T4-ONLY . HOWEVER , T4 SYNTHETIC DRUGS USUALLY PRESCRIPTIONS CONSIDERED . DOSAGE PRESCRIPTION BASED TSH LEVEL . PATIENTS REPORT TSH LEVEL NECESSARILY CORRELATE SYMPTOMS . THUS , PATIENT MAY TARGET TSH LEVEL , STILL UNDER-TREATED . NEW TESTS , FREE T3 , REVERSE T3 FREE T4 , TELL REVEALING STORY ; HOWEVER , ENDOCRINOLOGISTS GENERALLY UTILIZING TESTS . INSTEAD , TEST TOTAL T4 TOTAL T3 , QUANTIFY HORMONES FREE USEABLE WITHIN BODY . PATIENTS THYROID DYSFUNCTION COMPLAIN DIFFICULTY MOOD MANAGEMENT LETHARGY . REMEDY , ENDOCRINOLOGISTS RECOMMEND ANTI-DEPRESSANTS REFER US PSYCHIATRISTS . TRAVESTY OVERSIGHT . RESEARCH DEMONSTRATES IMPROVEMENT DEPRESSION USING T3 MEDICATION . HOWEVER , THYROID PATIENTS FIND CHALLENGING FIND ENDOCRINOLOGISTS WILLING PRESCRIBE CYTOMEL NATURAL THYROID , CONTAIN T3 . FAILURE ENDOCRINOLOGIST CORRECTLY ATTRIBUTE PSYCHOLOGICAL SYSTEMIC SYMPTOMS THYROID PATIENT THYROID DYSFUNCTION PERPETUATES PATIENT 'S ILLNESS . USUALLY LEADS PRESCRIPTION PHARMACEUTICAL MAY ALLEVIATE REPORTED SYMPTOMS , IGNORES ROOT CAUSE ; MISMANAGED THYROID.THYROID DYSFUNCTION INEFFECTIVE TREATMENT THYROID DYSFUNCTION ALSO CORRELATED HIGH CHOLESTEROL LEVELS . PATIENT HIGH CHOLESTEROL , ENDOCRINOLOGISTS PRESCRIBE DANGEROUS STATINS T3 SUPPLEMENTATION LOWER CHOLESTEROL SAFELY.ENDOCRINOLOGISTS MAY SKILLED DIABETES INNOVATIVE SUB-SPECIALTY , APPEAR LACKING KNOWLEDGE EXPERTISE THYROID DIAGNOSES MANAGEMENT . UNACCEPTABLE . RESULT , PATIENTS FORCED SELF-EDUCATE , SELF-TREAT WORSE , RECEIVE INADEQUATE TREATMENT SUFFER NEEDLESSLY . MANY PATIENTS FEEL FAILED MEDICAL COMMUNITY TURNING ONLINE SOURCES SHARING KNOWLEDGE . ONE ONLINE SOURCE METHOD PIONEERED PAUL ROBINSON CREATED PUBLISHED METHOD ADMINISTERING THYROID HORMONE , MAINLY T3 , ACCORDING CIRCADIAN RHYTHM T3CM . PATIENTS FINDING RELIEF T3CM METHOD . PAUL ROBINSON DOCTOR , RATHER , PATIENT SUFFERED TWENTY YEARS INADEQUATE THYROID TREATMENT.THIS PETITION BRINGING UNDERGROUND MOVEMENT CREATED THYROID PATIENTS MAINSTREAM ATTENTION DESERVES . INTERNATIONAL PATIENT REVOLUTION , DEMAND CHANGE . INEXCUSABLE PATIENTS CONTINUALLY ENCOUNTER ENDOCRINOLOGISTS PERPETUATE ILLNESSES INSUFFICIENT OUTDATED KNOWLEDGE.EACH SIGNATURE PETITION REPRESENTS PATIENT , PERSON LOVES PATIENT MISDIAGNOSED , MISTREATED DISMISSED ENDOCRINOLOGIST . MUST SOMEONE TAKES NOTICE HEARS VOICE . READ STORIES . COLLECTIVELY ASKING ENDOCRINOLOGISTS HEAR PLEA . PETITION INITIATIVE RESTORE FAITH DOCTORS.WE BELIEVE AWARENESS COME CHANGE . PLEASE HELP US END UNNECESSARY SUFFERING THYROID PATIENTS WORLDWIDE . WRITTEN : MICHELLE T. CAMPEAU EDITED : DENISE ROGUZ

DECISION TAKEN CONTEXT `` MILITARY OPERATION '' CALLED OFFICIAL RUSSIAN MEDIA , LAUNCHED VLADIMIR PUTIN UKRAINE , INTENDED LIMIT ECONOMIC OPPORTUNITIES REGIME . UNDERSTAND INTENTIONS VISA MASTERCARD . UNDERSTAND NEED SANCTIONS STOP MILITARY CONFLICT . , UNFORTUNATELY , PARTICULAR MEASURE WAY AFFECT EITHER PUTIN SUPPORTERS RUSSIA . VISA MASTERCARD 'S DECISION AFFECTS US - RUSSIANS RESIST PUTIN REGIME FORCED LEAVE RUSSIA THREAT CRIMINAL PROSECUTION POLITICAL VIEWS . FORCED EMIGRANTS , REMAINING MONEY RUSSIAN BANKS . MEANS SUBSISTENCE . ABLE PAY TEMPORARY SHELTER , FOOD , CLOTHES , FORCED RETURN BACK RUSSIA . INEVITABLY IMPRISONED POSITION CONFLICT UNLEASHED PUTIN UKRAINE ! ALSO , US LIVING WORKING ABROAD LONG TIME ABLE HELP PARENTS , GRANDPARENTS , RELATIVES REMAIN RUSSIA ONE REASON ANOTHER , TRANSFERS FOREIGN CARDS RUSSIAN ONES BLOCKED . RELATIVES N'T SUPPORT PUTIN EITHER ! CONVERSELY , SUPPORT PUTIN REMAIN RUSSIA PLANS LEAVE . EASILY REPLACE VISA MASTERCARD CARDS MIR CARDS ( RUSSIA 'S NATIONAL PAYMENT SYSTEM ) . THUS , DECISION VISA MASTERCARD COMPANIES AFFECT PEOPLE WAY . VISA MASTERCARD , PLEASE REVERSE DECISION SUSPEND TRANSACTIONS MADE RUSSIAN CARDS OUTSIDE RUSSIA . STRIKE PUTIN , STRIKE OPPONENTS POLITICAL EXILES !

full_content_nostopwords: READ ENGLISH TEXT BELOWМЫ ТРЕБУЕМ ОТМЕНИТЬ И ЗАКОНОДАТЕЛЬНО ЗАПРЕТИТЬ ОТСТРЕЛ ЛИС В САРАТОВСКОЙ ОБЛАСТИ РОССИИ , КОТОРЫЙ ПРОЙДЕТ С 1 ПО 31 ДЕКАБРЯ 2020 ГОДА.МЫ ПРОСИМ ВАС ПОДДЕРЖАТЬ НАШУ ПЕТИЦИЮ . НЕ БУДЬТЕ РАВНОДУШНЫ , НА КОНУ ЖИЗНИ 5 ТЫСЯЧ ЖИВОТНЫХ . У НАС ВСЕГО МЕСЯЦ ВРЕМЕНИ ... ОПИСАНИЕ СИТУАЦИИВ СМИ ГОВОРИТСЯ О ТОМ , ЧТО В САРАТОВСКОЙ ОБЛАСТИ ЗИМОЙ УБЬЮТ ПЯТЬ ТЫСЯЧ ЛИСИЦ . ЭТОТ ОТСТРЕЛ , ЯКОБЫ , БУДЕТ ПРОИЗВОДИТЬСЯ ДЛЯ СНИЖЕНИЯ ИХ ПОПУЛЯЦИИ . ЧИСЛЕННОСТЬ ЭТИХ ЖИВОТНЫХ СЕЙЧАС СОСТАВЛЯЕТ ОКОЛО 12,5 ТЫС . В 2019 ГОДУ ИХ БЫЛО НА ДВЕ ТЫС . БОЛЬШЕ . ВЛАСТИ ГОВОРЯТ , ЧТО СНИЖЕНИЕ ПОПУЛЯЦИИ НУЖНО ДЛЯ ТОГО , ЧТОБЫ КОНТРОЛИРОВАТЬ УРОВЕНЬ ЗАБОЛЕВАНИЯ БЕШЕНСТВОМ . ЭТОТ ОТСТРЕЛ ДОЛЖЕН ПРОЙТИ С 1 ПО 31 ДЕКАБРЯ 2020 ГОДА . КАК ПРОХОДИТ И ЧТО ИЗ СЕБЯ ПРЕДСТАВЛЯЕТ ОТСТРЕЛВО ВРЕМЯ ОТСТРЕЛА НА ЛИС СТАВЯТ КАПКАНЫ , ЗАСЫПЫВАЮТ ИМ НОРЫ , РАЗМЕЩАЮТ ЛОВУШКИ В ТЕХ МЕСТАХ , ГДЕ ЭТИ ЖИВОТНЫЕ ИЩУТ ПИЩУ . ОЧЕНЬ ЧАСТО ЛИС УБИВАЮТ В НОРАХ ВМЕСТЕ С ДЕТЁНЫШАМИ . ИНОГДА , ОБЫЧНО ЗИМОЙ , ОТСТРЕЛ ПРОИЗВОДИТСЯ ИЗ СНЕГОХОДОВ.ВОЗМОЖНО ЛИС УБИВАЮТ РАДИ ТОГО , ЧТОБЫ ПОЛУЧИТЬ ИХ МЕХ , А ПОТОМ ПРОДАТЬ ЕГО . МЫ НЕ ЗНАЕМ . ТАКИЕ ОТСТРЕЛЫ В САРАТОВСКОЙ ОБЛАСТИ НЕ РЕДКОСТЬ , ОНИ ПРОВОДЯТСЯ НЕ ТОЛЬКО ОДИН РАЗ В ГОД , БЫВАЕТ И НЕСКОЛЬКО РАЗ . ИЗ-ЗА ЭТОГО ВОЗНИКАЕТ ВОПРОС : А ДЛЯ ЧЕГО ? ПОЧЕМУ ОТСТРЕЛ НУЖНО ОТМЕНИТЬ И ЗАПРЕТИТЬОТСТРЕЛ - ЭТО ЖЕСТОКОЕ И НИЧЕМ НЕ АРГУМЕНТИРОВАННОЕ УБИЙСТВО , В КОТОРОМ НЕТ НЕОБХОДИМОСТИ.ИЗ-ЗА ОТСТРЕЛОВ СОРОДИЧЕЙ , ЛИСЫ ЧУВСТВУЮТ СЕБЯ В ОПАСНОСТИ , ПОКИДАЯ СВОИ ЕСТЕСТВЕННЫЕ МЕСТА ОБИТАНИЯ , ОНИ ПОДХОДЯТ БЛИЖЕ К ЛЮДЯМ И НАСЕЛЁННЫМ ПУНКТАМ.ЧТОБЫ ПРЕДОТВРАТИТЬ РАСПРОСТРАНЕНИЕ БЕШЕНСТВА , НУЖНО ПОДКИДЫВАТЬ В МЕСТА ОБИТАНИЯ ЛИС КОРМ С ВАКЦИНОЙ , КАК В ДРУГИХ ЦИВИЛИЗОВАННЫХ СТРАНАХ , А НЕ УБИВАТЬ ИХ.ЕСЛИ ВЛАСТЯМ ТАК ВАЖНО СНИЖЕНИЕ КОЛИЧЕСТВА ЭТИХ ЖИВОТНЫХ В САРАТОВСКОЙ ОБЛАСТИ , ОНИ МОГУТ ИХ ОТЛОВИТЬ И ТРАНСПОРТИРОВАТЬ В ТЕ РЕГИОНЫ РОССИИ , ГДЕ ПОПУЛЯЦИЯ ЭТОГО ВИДА ОЧЕНЬ НИЗКАЯ . ЭТО ПРОЩЕ , ЧЕМ УБИВАТЬ ИХ . ТЕМ БОЛЕЕ , ЧТО УБИТЬ ВСЕХ НЕ СМОГУТ , И НЕПОНЯТНО , КАКИХ ИМЕННО ОНИ БУДУТ УБИВАТЬ - БОЛЬНЫХ ИЛИ ЗДОРОВЫХ . А ВАКЦИНИРОВАТЬ МОЖНО ВСЕХ . ЧЕМ ОПАСЕН ОТСТРЕЛ ЛИСОТСТРЕЛ ЛИС НАРУШИТ ЭКОСИСТЕМУ В РЕГИОНЕ . ЕСЛИ КОЛИЧЕСТВО ЭТИХ ЖИВОТНЫХ СНИЗИТСЯ , НАЧНЁТ УВЕЛИЧИВАТЬСЯ ПОПУЛЯЦИЯ ГРЫЗУНОВ , КОТОРЫЕ ЯВЛЯЮТСЯ ОПАСНЫМИ ПЕРЕНОСЧИКАМИ , ЧТО НАНЕСЕТ СОКРУШИТЕЛЬНЫЙ УДАР НЕ ТОЛЬКО ПО ЭКОЛОГИИ , НО И ПО ЭКОНОМИКЕ И ЗДРАВООХРАНЕНИЮ . ВОЗМОЖНЫЕ ПОСЛЕДСТВИЯ:1 . УВЕЛИЧИТСЯ ЗАБОЛЕВАЕМОСТЬ ГЕМОРРАГИЧЕСКОЙ ЛИХОРАДКОЙ С ПОЧЕЧНЫМ СИНДРОМОМ ( ГЛПС ) И ДРУГИМИ ПРИРОДНО-ОЧАГОВЫМИ ИНФЕКЦИОННЫМИ ЗАБОЛЕВАНИЯМИ.2 . УВЕЛИЧЕНИЕ ПОПУЛЯЦИИ ГРЫЗУНОВ ПОВЛЕЧЕТ ЗА СОБОЙ УВЕЛИЧЕНИЕ ЧИСЛЕННОСТИ ИКСОДОВЫХ КЛЕЩЕЙ3 . УВЕЛИЧИТСЯ ЗАБОЛЕВАЕМОСТЬ КЛЕЩЕВЫМ БОРРЕЛИОЗОМ И ВИРУСНЫМ ЭНЦЕФАЛИТОМ.4 . УВЕЛИЧЕНИЕ ЧИСЛЕННОСТИ ГРЫЗУНОВ ПОВЛЕЧЕТ ЗА СОБОЙ УХУДШЕНИЕ САНИТАРНОГО СОСТОЯНИЯ ЛЕСОВ И ЛЕСОЗАЩИТНЫХ ПОЛОС , ПОЛЕЙ.5 . УВЕЛИЧИТСЯ ЧИСЛО СЛУЧАЕВ ЗАБОЛЕВАНИЯ БЕШЕНСТВОМ СРЕДИ ДИКИХ ЖИВОТНЫХ И ВОЗНИКНОВЕНИЯ СЛУЧАЕВ СРЕДИ ДОМАШНИХ ЖИВОТНЫХ , ТАКЖЕ УВЕЛИЧИТСЯ РИСК ЗАРАЖЕНИЯ БЕШЕНСТВОМ ЛЮДЕЙ.6 . ИЗ-ЗА БОЛЬШОГО КОЛИЧЕСТВА ГРЫЗУНОВ УЧАСТИТСЯ ИХ МИГРАЦИЯ В НАСЕЛЕННЫЕ ПУНКТЫ , КОТОРЫЕ РАСПОЛОЖЕНЫ ВБЛИЗИ ЛЕСОВ , ЧТО ПОВЛЕЧЕТ ЗА СОБОЙ НАПРЯЖЕННУЮ ЭПИДЕМИОЛОГИЧЕСКУЮ ОБСТАНОВКУ.7 . УВЕЛИЧИТСЯ ЧИСЛО СЛУЧАЕВ ЗАБОЛЕВАНИЯ ТУЛЯРЕМИЕЙ , ПСЕВДОТУБЕРКУЛЁЗОМ , ЛЕПТОСПИРОЗОМ , ЛИСТЕРИОЗОМ И Т.Д . НОСИТЕЛЯМИ ЭТИХ ЗАБОЛЕВАНИЙ МОГУТ БЫТЬ ЗАЙЦЫ , КРОЛИКИ , ВОДЯНЫЕ КРЫСЫ , ПОЛЁВКИ.8 . БУДЕТ НАНЕСЕН УЩЕРБ СЕЛЬСКОМУ ХОЗЯЙСТВУ , В ЧАСТНОСТИ ЗАПАСАМ И УРОЖАЮ ЗЕРНОВЫХ , ЧТО ПОВЛЕЧЕТ УВЕЛИЧЕНИЕ ИХ СТОИМОСТИ.9 . ГРЫЗУНЫ НАНЕСУТ УЩЕРБ СЕЛЬХОЗТЕХНИКЕ : ПЕРЕГРЫЗУТ ЭЛЕКТРОПРОВОДКИ , ШЛАНГИ , ИСПОРТЯТ ПОДУШКИ СИДЕНИЙ.10 . НАШЕСТВИЕ ГРЫЗУНОВ НАНЕСЕТ УЩЕРБ КАК ПОСТАВЩИКАМ , ТАК И ПОТРЕБИТЕЛЯМ , Т.К . ПРОИЗВОДИТЕЛИ НЕ СМОГУТ УДОВЛЕТВОРИТЬ СПРОС НА ПРОДУКЦИЮ.11 . ОГРОМНЫЙ УЩЕРБ БУДЕТ ПРИЧИНЕН ЖИВОТНОВОДЧЕСКИМ ХОЗЯЙСТВАМ . В КУРЯТНИКАХ , НАПРИМЕР , ГРЫЗУНЫ ПОЕДАЮТ ЯЙЦА И ЦЫПЛЯТ.12 . СИЛЬНЫЙ УДАР ГРЫЗУНЫ НАНЕСУТ ФЕРМЕРСКИМ ХОЗЯЙСТВАМ . ИЗ-ЗА ВРЕДИТЕЛЕЙ ЕЩЕ ДО УБОРКИ ПОГИБАЕТ 20 % УРОЖАЯ , КРЫСЫ ГРЫЗУТ САЖЕНЦЫ , ОБЪЕДАЮТ КОРУ ПЛОДОВЫХ ДЕРЕВЬЕВ , ЧТО ПРИВОДИТ К ИХ ГИБЕЛИ . title_cleaned_nostopwords: VIOLENCE WOMEN REAUTHORIZA
description_nostopwords: WOMEN REAUTHORIZATION ACT ( VAWA ) BIPARTISAN SUPPORT — URGE SENATE FOLLOW LEAD WOMEN . , RE-AUTHORIZATION , CONGRESS EXPANDED VAWA ’ PROVISIONS BIPARTISAN BASIS IMPROVE PROTECTIONS , INCLUDING NATIVE AMERICAN WOMEN SURVIVORS UNDERSERVED SIGNIFICANT PROGRESS , STILL MUCH WORK . MANY 1 3 WOMEN SUBJECTED DOMESTIC HIGHER WOMEN COLOR , NATIVE AMERICAN WOMEN , MEMBERS LGBTQ COMMUNITY . GROWING
full_content_nostopwords: PRESIDENT JOE BIDEN ! ! ! APPLAUD HOUSE REPRESENTATIVES PASSING VIOLENCE WOMEN REAUTHORIZATION ACT ( VAWA ) BIPARTISAN SUPPORT — URGE SENATE FOLLOW LEAD RENEW STRENGTHEN LANDMARK LAW . WRITING PASSING VAWA ONE LEGISLATIVE ACCOMPLISHMENTS ’ PROUD . VAWA TRANSFORMED WAY COUNTRY RESPONDS VIOLENCE WOMEN . , RE-AUTHORIZATION , CONGRESS EXPANDED VAWA ’ PROVISIONS BIPARTISAN BASIS IMPROVE PROTECTIONS , INCLUDING NATIVE AMERICAN WOMEN SURVIVORS UNDERSERVED COMMUNITIES , IMPROVE EFFORTS PREVENT INTIMATE PARTNER VIOLENCE . MADE SIGNIFICANT PROGRESS , STILL MUCH WORK . MANY 1 3 WOMEN SUBJECTED DOMESTIC VIOLENCE , DATING VIOLENCE , SEXUAL ASSAULT , STALKING POINT LIVES , RATE EVEN HIGHER WOMEN COLOR , NATIVE AMERICAN WOMEN , MEMBERS LGBTQ COMMUNITY . GROWING EVIDENCE SHOWS COVID-19 EXACERBATED THREAT INTIMATE PARTNER VIOLENCE , CREATING PANDEMIC WITHIN PANDEMIC COUNTLESS WOMEN RISK ABUSE . SHORT , URGENT CRISIS . DEMOCRATIC REPUBLICAN ISSUE — ’ STANDING ABUSE POWER PREVENTING VIOLENCE . GRATEFUL HOUSE REPRESENTATIVES LEADERSHIP DEDICATION ENDING GENDER-BASED VIOLENCE . , URGE SENATE FOLLOW PAST PRECEDENT BRING STRONG BIPARTISAN COALITION TOGETHER ENSURE PASSAGE VAWA SIGN LEGISLATION SOON POSSIBLE . PRESIDENT JOE BIDEN ! ! ! APLAUSO LA CÁMARA DE REPRESENTANTES POR APROBAR LA LEY DE REAUTORIZACIÓN DE VIOLENCIA CONTRA LAS MUJERES ( VAWA ) CON APOYO BIPARTIDISTA , E INSTO AL SENADO SEGUIR SU EJEMPLO PARA RENOVAR FORTALECER ESTA LEY HISTÓRICA . ESCRIBIR APROBAR VAWA ES UNO DE LOS LOGROS LEGISLATIVOS DE LOS QUE ESTOY MÁS ORGULLOSO . VAWA HA TRANSFORMADO LA FORMA EN QUE NUESTRO PAÍS RESPONDE LA VIOLENCIA CONTRA LAS MUJERES . , CON CADA REAUTORIZACIÓN , EL CONGRESO HA AMPLIADO LAS DISPOSICIONES DE VAWA SOBRE UNA BASE BIPARTIDISTA PARA MEJORAR LAS PROTECCIONES , INCLUSO PARA LAS MUJERES NATIVAS AMERICANAS SOBREVIVIENTES DE COMUNIDADES DESATENDIDAS , MEJORAR LOS ESFUERZOS PARA PREVENIR LA VIOLENCIA DE PAREJA ÍNTIMA . SI BIEN HEMOS LOGRADO AVANCES IMPORTANTES , TODAVÍA QUEDA MUCHO TRABAJO POR HACER . HASTA 1 DE CADA 3 MUJERES SON SOMETIDAS VIOLENCIA DOMÉSTICA , VIOLENCIA EN EL NOVIAZGO , AGRESIÓN SEXUAL ACOSO EN ALGÚN MOMENTO DE SUS VIDAS , LA TASA ES AÚN MAYOR PARA LAS MUJERES DE COLOR , LAS MUJERES NATIVAS AMERICANAS LOS MIEMBROS DE LA COMUNIDAD LGBTQ . LA CRECIENTE EVIDENCIA MUESTRA QUE COVID-19 SOLO HA EXACERBADO LA AMENAZA DE VIOLENCIA POR PARTE DE LA PAREJA ÍNTIMA , CREANDO UNA PANDEMIA DENTRO DE UNA PANDEMIA PARA INNUMERABLES MUJERES EN RIESGO DE ABUSO . EN RESUMEN , ESTA ES UNA CRISIS URGENTE . ESTE DEBERÍA SER UN TEMA DEMÓCRATA REPUBLICANO , SE TRATA DE OPONERSE AL ABUSO DE PODER PREVENIR LA VIOLENCIA . AGRADEZCO LA CÁMARA DE REPRESENTANTES POR SU LIDERAZGO DEDICACIÓN PARA PONER FIN LA VIOLENCIA DE GÉNERO . AHORA , INSTO AL SENADO SEGUIR EL PRECEDENTE PASADO REUNIR UNA FUERTE COALICIÓN BIPARTIDISTA PARA GARANTIZAR LA APPROBATION DE VAWA PARA QUE PUEDA FIRMAR ESTA LEGISLACIÓN LO ANTES POSIBLE .

title_cleaned_nostopwords: DINGO CONSERVATION CRUCIAL BIODIVERSITY
description_nostopwords: ECOLOGICAL RESEARCH AROUND WORLD INCREASINGLY EMPHASISED IMPORTANCE APEX PREDATORS ECOSYSTEM HEALTH , PRESERVATION BIODIVERSITY . DIMINISHING APEX PREDATOR POPULATIONS OFTEN ASSOCIATED ECOSYSTEM INSTABILITY SPECIES DECLINE . FALSE DINGO/ ’ WILD DOG ’ DISTINCTION CURRENT GOVERNMENT POLICIY AUSTRALIA OBSTRUCTS POLICY RECOGNITION ECOLOGICAL REALITY . POSITIVE ROLE DINGOES WITHIN AUSTRALIAN ECOSYSTEMS NATIVE WILDLIFE UNDERMINED USE LETHAL POISONS REMOVE 'WILD DOGS ' DINGOES , EXOTIC NON NATIVE PREDATORS , DINGOES FALLING VICTIM COLLATERAL DAMAGE . AUSTRALIA 'S LEADING ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENTISTS ENDORSED REMOVAL TOXIC POISONS ( 1080 ) USE KILLING AUSTRALIAN DINGO ENVIRONMENTAL GROUNDS . FEDERAL STATE GOVERNMENTS MUST ACT DEVELOP IMPLEMENT POLICY CONSIDERS IMPORTANT ECOLOGICAL CULTURAL IDENTITY DINGO , DEVELOP ALTERNATIVE STOCK PROTECTION METHODOLOGY WHEREVER NECESSARY , AVOID LETHAL CONTROL . SCIENTIFIC EXPERTS EMPHASISE MOUNTING COMPELLING EVIDENCE INDISCRIMINATE BAITING DINGOES , INCLUDING CONSEQUENCE COLLATERAL SECONDARY POISONING , EXACERBATES LIVESTOCK PREDATION NEGATIVE ECOLOGICAL CONSEQUENCES , SERIOUSLY HARM BIODIVERSITY , RESILIENCE HEALTH AUSTRALIAN ECOSYSTEMS IMPACTS LETHAL CONTROL DINGOES LIKELY FACILITATE INCREASES WILD CATS , FOXES HERBIVORE POPULATIONS ( KANGAROOS , FERAL GOATS , FERAL PIGS , ETC . ) CURRENTLY MANAGED PEST SPECIES . MANY AUSTRALIA ’ THREATENED MAMMALS SURVIVE AREAS DINGOES PRESENT , INCREASE INTENSITY FREQUENCY POISON BAITING , LIKELY DETRIMENTAL PERSISTENCE . REINTRODUCTION DINGOES ENVIRONMENT AUSTRALIA WHEREVER POPULATIONS REMOVED /OR DECIMATED , RECOMMENDED VICTORIAN STATE GOVERNMENT FOLLOWING RECENT INQUIRY THREATENED SPECIES , MUST ACKNOWLEDGED BENEFICIAL BIODIVERSITY ACTED UPON VICTORIA STATES TERRITORIES AUSTRALIA MUST CONDUCT SIMILAR INQUIRIES INFORM OUTCOMES BENEFIT ENVIRONMENT . EXAGGERATED CLAIMS DINGOES STOCK LOSS PREDATION , DATA OBTAINED AFCAD INC FREEDOM INFORMATION STATE SHOWN CLAIMS STOCK LOSS DINGOES , STATES AUSTRALIA , EXAGGERATED NEGLIGIBLE . ISSUES MUST FULLY ADDRESSED COMMONWEALTH STATE GOVERNMENTS USE LETHAL CONTROL ABANDONED FAVOUR NON LETHAL MEASURES WITHOUT HESITATION DELAY REINTRODUCTION DINGOES SUITABLE AREAS CONSIDERED PRIORITY . OTHERWISE IRRESPONSIBLE PHOTO : GARY MEREDITH

description_nostopwords: CITIES DEPRIVE CIVILIANS ACCESS FOOD MEDICINE.YESTERDAY MARCH , 2ND UNITED NATIONS
full_content_nostopwords: : PEACEFUL PEOPLE WORLDTODAY UKRAINIAN PEOPLE STAND RUSSIAN INVASION DESPERATELY FIGHT LIVES , RIGHTS FREEDOM . RUSSIA , RULED PRESIDENT PUTIN , EXERTING SYSTEMATIC PRESSURE COUNTRY SINCE 2014 , ANNEXED CRIMEA , OCCUPIED PART DONBASS OFFICIALLY , FALSE CAUSE , INVADED COUNTRY ! AGGRESSORS ' TROOPS LARGE NUMBER COME UKRAINE BELARUS TERRITORY.RIGHT THOUSANDS CIVILIAN PEOPLE DIED , FLED , HIDE BUNKERS JOIN UKRAINIAN ARMED FORCES , COURAGEOUSLY DEFEND ENEMY . INVADERS BOMB CITIES , DESTROY HOUSES , ROADS , INFRASTRUCTURE , ATTACK COMMERCIAL VESSELS , HARM NATURE , BLOCKADE CITIES DEPRIVE CIVILIANS ACCESS FOOD MEDICINE.YESTERDAY MARCH , 2ND UNITED NATIONS GENERAL ASSEMBLY RESOLUTION PASSED 141 NATIONS CONDEMNING RUSSIA ’ INVASION UKRAINE , CLEARLY SHOWS WHOLE CIVILIZED WORLD SUPPORTS COUNTRY . ALSO , DEEPEST GRATITUDE WOULD LIKE THANK PRESIDENT MR. RECEP TAYYIP ERDOĞAN , GOVERNMENT PEOPLE TURKEY CLOSING BOSPHORUS DARDANELLES STRAIT RUSSIAN WARSHIPS.TODAY , ADDRESS RACE DIRECTORS SAMSUNG BOSPHORUS CROSS-CONTINENTAL SWIMMING COMPETITION , TURKISH OLYMPIC COMMITTEE MINISTRY YOUTH SPORTS . ASK JOIN INTERNATIONAL OLYMPIC COMMITTEE BIGGEST SPORTS ORGANIZATIONS LIKE UEFA , FIFA , NHL , FINA , LEN , OCEANMAN , WORLD TRIATHLON ORGANIZATION , IRONMAN OTHERS UNITED POSITION RUSSIAN INVASION UKRAINE.AS RECENT RESEARCH SHOWS , 70 % RUSSIANS , BECAME VICTIMS PROPAGANDA , SUPPORT WAR . RUSSIAN BELARUS SWIMMERS TRAIN CROSS BOSPHORUS STRAIT , RUSSIAN TROOPS CROSS UKRAINIAN BORDERS KILL CIVILIANS DESTROY CITIES . INVADERS TROOPS COME BOMBS FALL BELARUS TERRITORY . REQUEST CONDEMN RUSSIAN INVASION BAN RUSSIAN BELARUS ATHLETES PARTICIPATING POPULAR SWIM RACE WORLD , SUPPORT PUTIN 'S REGIME WAR.SPORT ALWAYS SEPARATED POLITICS . SPORT ALSO SYNONYM PEACE . GREAT TRADITION STOP WARS OLYMPICS BROKEN 3 TIMES WORLD WAR II . TODAY WORLD STANDS DOORS WORLD WAR III . TODAY , SILENT MEANS SUPPORT WAR . TODAY , POSITION STRICT PEACEFUL VALUES , WHOLE WORLDS DOES.DO N'T SILENT ! STOP RUSSIAN AGGRESSION ! STOP WAR !

DICHIARAZIONE UNIVERSALE DEI DIRITTI DELL'ANIMALE UNIVERSAL DECLARATION ANIMAL RIGHTS PREAMBLE : CONSIDERING LIFE ONE , LIVING BEINGS COMMON ORIGIN DIVERSIFIED COURSE EVOLUTION SPECIES , - CONSIDERING LIVING BEINGS POSSESS NATURAL RIGHTS , ANIMAL NERVOUS SYSTEM SPECIFIC RIGHTS , CONSIDERING CONTEMPT , EVEN SIMPLE IGNORANCE , NATURAL RIGHTS , CAUSE SERIOUS DAMAGE NATURE LEAD MEN COMMIT CRIMES ANIMALS , CONSIDERING COEXISTENCE SPECIES IMPLIES RECOGNITION HUMAN SPECIES RIGHT ANIMAL SPECIES LIVE , CONSIDERING RESPECT ANIMALS HUMANS INSEPARABLE RESPECT MEN , HEREBY PROCLAIMED : ARTICLE 1 ANIMALS EQUAL RIGHTS EXIST WITHIN CONTEXT BIOLOGICAL EQUILIBRIUM . EQUALITY RIGHTS OVERSHADOW DIVERSITY SPECIES INDIVIDUALS . ARTICLE 2 ANIMAL LIFE RIGHT RESPECTED . ARTICLE 3 1°- ANIMALS MUST SUBJECTED BAD TREATMENTS CRUEL ACTS . 2°- NECESSARY KILL ANIMAL , MUST INSTANTANEOUS , PAINLESS CAUSE APPREHENSION . 3°- DEAD ANIMAL MUST TREATED DECENCY . ARTICLE 4 1°- WILD ANIMALS RIGHT LIVE REPRODUCE FREEDOM NATURAL ENVIRONMENT . 2°- PROLONGED DEPRIVATION FREEDOM WILD ANIMALS , HUNTING FISHING PRACTISED PASTIME , WELL USE WILD ANIMALS REASONS VITAL , CONTRARY FUNDAMENTAL RIGHT . ARTICLE 5 1°- ANIMAL DEPENDENT MAN RIGHT PROPER SUSTENANCE CARE . 2°- MUST CIRCUMSTANCES ABANDONED KILLED UNJUSTIFIABLY . 3°- FORMS BREEDING USES ANIMAL MUST RESPECT PHYSIOLOGY BEHAVIOUR SPECIFIC SPECIES . 4°- EXHIBITIONS , SHOWS FILMS INVOLVING ANIMALS MUST ALSO RESPECT DIGNITY MUST INCLUDE VIOLENCE WHATSOEVER . ARTICLE 6 1°- EXPERIMENTS ANIMALS ENTAILING PHYSICAL PSYCHOLOGICAL SUFFERING VIOLATE RIGHTS ANIMALS . 2°-REPLACEMENT METHODS MUST DEVELOPED SYSTEMATICALLY IMPLEMENTED . ARTICLE 7 ACT UNNECESSARY INVOLVING DEATH ANIMAL , DECISION LEADING ACT , CONSTITUTE CRIME LIFE . ARTICLE 8 1°- ACT COMPROMISING SURVIVAL WILD SPECIES DECISION LEADING ACT TANTAMOUNT GENOCIDE , SAY , CRIME SPECIES . 2°- MASSACRE WILD ANIMALS , POLLUTION DESTRUCTION BIOTOPES ACTS GENOCIDE . ARTICLE 9 1°- SPECIFIC LEGAL STATUS ANIMALS RIGHTS MUST RECOGNISED LAW . 2°- PROTECTION SAFETY ANIMALS MUST REPRESENTED LEVEL GOVERNMENTAL ORGANIZATIONS . ARTICLE 10 EDUCATIONAL SCHOOLING AUTHORITIES MUST ENSURE CITIZENS LEARN CHILDHOOD OBSERVE , UNDERSTAND RESPECT ANIMALS . PREMESSA CONSIDERATO CHE OGNI ANIMALE HA DEI DIRITTI ; CONSIDERATO CHE IL DISCONOSCIMENTO E IL DISPREZZO DI QUESTI DIRITTI HANNO PORTATO E CONTINUANO PORTARE L ' UOMO COMMETTERE CRIMINI CONTRO LA NATURA E CONTRO GLI ANIMALI ; CONSIDERATO CHE IL RICONOSCIMENTO DA PARTE DELLA SPECIE UMANA DEL DIRITTO ALL'ESISTENZA DELLE ALTRE SPECIE ANIMALI COSTITUISCE IL FONDAMENTO DELLA COESISTENZA DELLE SPECIE NEL MONDO ; CONSIDERATO CHE GENOCIDI SONO PERPETRATI DALL ' UOMO E ALTRI ANCORA SE NE MINACCIANO ; CONSIDERATO CHE IL RISPETTO DEGLI ANIMALI DA PARTE DEGLI UOMINI È LEGATO AL RISPETTO DEGLI UOMINI TRA LORO ; CONSIDERATO CHE L'EDUCAZIONE DEVE INSEGNARE SIN DALL'INFANZIA OSSERVARE , COMPRENDERE , RISPETTARE E AMARE GLI ANIMALI . SI PROCLAMA : ARTICOLO 1 TUTTI GLI ANIMALI NASCONO UGUALI DAVANTI ALLA VITA E HANNO GLI STESSI DIRITTI ALL'ESISTENZA . ARTICOLO 2 ) OGNI ANIMALE HA DIRITTO AL RISPETTO ; B ) L'UOMO , QUANTO SPECIE ANIMALE , NON PUÒ ATTRIBUIRSI IL DIRITTO DI STERMINARE GLI ALTRI ANIMALI DI SFRUTTARLI VIOLANDO QUESTO DIRITTO . EGLI HA IL DOVERE DI METTERE LE SUE CONOSCENZE AL SERVIZIO DEGLI ANIMALI ; C ) OGNI ANIMALE HA DIRITTO ALLA CONSIDERAZIONE , ALLE CURE E ALLA PROTEZIONE DELL'UOMO . ARTICOLO 3 ) NESSUN ANIMALE DOVRÀ ESSERE SOTTOPOSTO MALTRATTAMENTI E AD ATTI CRUDELI ; B ) SE LA SOPPRESSIONE DI UN ANIMALE È NECESSARIA , DEVE ESSERE ISTANTANEA , SENZA DOLORE , NÈ ANGOSCIA . ARTICOLO 4 ) OGNI ANIMALE CHE APPARTIENE UNA SPECIE SELVAGGIA HA IL DIRITTO DI VIVERE LIBERO NEL SUO AMBIENTE NATURALE TERRESTRE , AEREO ACQUATICO E HA IL DIRITTO DI RIPRODURSI ; B ) OGNI PRIVAZIONE DI LIBERTÀ , ANCHE SE FINI EDUCATIVI , È CONTRARIA QUESTO DIRITTO . ARTICOLO 5 ) OGNI ANIMALE APPARTENENTE AD UNA SPECIE CHE VIVE ABITUALMENTE NELL'AMBIENTE DELL ' UOMO HA DIRITTO DI VIVERE E DI CRESCERE SECONDO IL RITMO E NELLE CONDIZIONI DI VITA E DI LIBERTÀ CHE SONO PROPRIE DELLA SUA SPECIE ; B ) OGNI MODIFICA DI QUESTO RITMO E DI QUESTE CONDIZIONI IMPOSTA DALL'UOMO FINI MERCANTILI È CONTRARIA QUESTO DIRITTO . ARTICOLO 6A ) OGNI ANIMALE CHE L'UOMO HA SCELTO PER COMPAGNO HA DIRITTO AD UNA DURATA DELLA VITA CONFORME ALLA SUA NATURALE LONGEVITA ' ; B ) L'ABBANDONO DI UN ANIMALE È UN ATTO CRUDELE E DEGRADANTE . ARTICOLO 7OGNI ANIMALE CHE LAVORA HA DIRITTO RAGIONEVOLI LIMITAZIONI DI DURATA E INTENSITÀ DI LAVORO , AD UN'ALIMENTAZIONE ADEGUATA E AL RIPOSO . ARTICOLO 8A ) LA SPERIMENTAZIONE ANIMALE CHE IMPLICA UNA SOFFERENZA FISICA PSICHICA È INCOMPATIBILE CON DIRITTI DELL ' ANIMALE SIA CHE SI TRATTI DI UNA SPERIMENTAZIONE MEDICA , SCIENTIFICA , COMMERCIALE , SIA DI OGNI ALTRA FORMA DI SPERIMENTAZIONE ; B ) LE TECNICHE SOSTITUTIVE DEVONO ESSERE UTILIZZATE E SVILUPPATE . ARTICOLO 9NEL CASO CHE L'ANIMALE SIA ALLEVATO PER L'ALIMENTAZIONE DEVE ESSERE NUTRITO , ALLOGGIATO , TRASPORTATO E UCCISO SENZA CHE PER LUI NE RISULTI ANSIETÀ ' E DOLORE . ARTICOLO 10A ) NESSUN ANIMALE DEVE ESSERE USATO PER IL DIVERTIMENTO DELL ' UOMO ; B ) LE ESIBIZIONI DI ANIMALI E GLI SPETTACOLI CHE UTILIZZANO DEGLI ANIMALI SONO INCOMPATIBILI CON LA DIGNITÀ DELL'ANIMALE . ARTICOLO 11OGNI ATTO CHE COMPORTI L'UCCISIONE DI UN ANIMALE SENZA NECESSITÀ È UN BIOCIDIO , CIOÈ UN DELITTO CONTRO LA VITA . ARTICOLO 12 OGNI ATTO CHE COMPORTI L'UCCISIONE DI UN GRAN NUMERO DI ANIMALI SELVAGGI È UN GENOCIDIO , CIOÈ UN DELITTO CONTRO LA SPECIE ; B ) L'INQUINAMENTO E LA DISTRUZIONE DELL'AMBIENTE NATURALE PORTANO AL GENOCIDIO . ARTICOLO 13A ) L'ANIMALE MORTO DEVE ESSERE TRATTATO CON RISPETTO ; B ) LE SCENE DI VIOLENZA DI CUI GLI ANIMALI SONO VITTIME DEVONO ESSERE PROIBITE AL CINEMA E ALLA TELEVISIONE MENO CHE NON ABBIANO COME FINE DI MOSTRARE UN ATTENTATO AI DIRITTI DELL'ANIMALE . ARTICOLO 14A ) LE ASSOCIAZIONI DI PROTEZIONE E DI SALVAGUARDIA DEGLI ANIMALI DEVONO ESSERE RAPPRESENTATE LIVELLO GOVERNATIVO ; B ) DIRITTI DELL ' ANIMALE DEVONO ESSERE DIFESI DALLA LEGGE COME DIRITTI DELL'UOMO . title_cleaned_nostopwords: PETITION INTERNATIONAL MARITIME ORGANIZATION STOP PLASTIC PELLET POLLUTION SEA
description_nostopwords: PUBLIC SUPPORT ADVANCE MEETING ENORMOUSLY HELPFUL TOWARDS SECURING MEASURES
full_content_nostopwords: MAY 2021 , MV X-PRESS PEARL SPILT 1,680 TONNES PLASTIC PELLETS 9,700 TONNES PLASTICS NINE MILES SRI LANKAN COAST . PLASTIC ACCUMULATING BEACHES 2 METERS HIGH , ONE WORST ENVIRONMENTAL DISASTERS COUNTRY 'S HISTORY , SINGLE LARGEST PLASTIC PELLET POLLUTION EVENT WORLD EVER SEEN . CONTINUES CAUSE OVERWHELMING ECONOMIC , SOCIAL ENVIRONMENTAL IMPACTS , LEGACY TOXIC POLLUTION CONTINUE PROFOUND ENDURING IMPACTS MANY GENERATIONS COME . INCIDENT RESULTED SEVERE POLLUTION 750 KM PRISTINE , BIODIVERSE COASTLINE DEATHS MANY HUNDREDS CHARISMATIC MARINE SPECIES TURTLES , WHALES DOLPHINS . CONSUMPTION FISH , MAIN PROTEIN SOURCE 40 % SRI LANKANS , REDUCED DRASTICALLY , LIVELIHOOD FISHERS SEVERELY IMPACTED DUE COASTAL FISHING BAN ACROSS ENTIRE WEST COAST . PLASTIC PELLETS ( ALSO KNOWN 'NURDLES ' ) TINY LENTIL-SIZED BALLS MEASURING 5MM LESS . FEEDSTOCK INDUSTRY - MELTED MOULDED MANUFACTURING COMPANIES PLASTIC PRODUCTS . GIVEN SMALL SIZE , EASILY OFTEN SPILT STAGE ALONG PELLET SUPPLY CHAIN , INCREASINGLY LARGE SCALE SPILLAGE EVENTS OCCURRING SEA . HOWEVER , DESPITE FOUND ALMOST EVERY COASTLINE SURVEYED , GROWING EVIDENCE PELLETS ACT TOXIC SPONGES EATEN WIDE RANGE MARINE LIFE , CURRENTLY CONSIDERED PERSISTENT , HAZARDOUS , POLLUTANTS . STRICTER CLASSIFICATION INTERNATIONAL MARITIME ORGANIZATION WOULD MEAN PELLETS HANDLED SEA AKIN HARMFUL HAZARDOUS SUBSTANCES . CLASSIFICATION WOULD MEAN FAR STRICTER HANDLING LABELLING INSTRUCTIONS ENFORCED , DECK STOWAGE ADEQUATE DISASTER RESPONSE PROTOCOLS WOULD LIMIT FALLOUT FELT SRI LANKA WAKE FUTURE SHIPPING DISASTERS . NOVEMBER 22ND - NOVEMBER 25TH , INTERNATIONAL MARITIME ORGANIZATION 'S MARINE ENVIRONMENT PROTECTION COMMITTEE MEET . AGENDA PROPOSAL SRI LANKA ESTABLISH INTERNATIONAL GUIDELINES REQUIREMENTS TRANSPORTATION PLASTIC PELLETS URGENTLY NEEDED . SHOW PUBLIC SUPPORT ADVANCE MEETING ENORMOUSLY HELPFUL TOWARDS SECURING MEASURES , RAISING PROFILE LITTLE-KNOWN HIGHLY DESTRUCTIVE FORM PLASTIC POLLUTION .
